analyzed: svarpa pratipattau na a prāmāṇyam āgama vākyānām

original: na svarūpapratipattāv aprāmāṇyam eṣāṃ pratipattavyam, medhyāmedhyatvasvarūpapratipādakānāṃ svarganarakādisvarūpatatsādhanāṅgasvarūpapratipādakānāṃ ca vākyānāṃ prāmāṇyopapatteḥ. na hi svarūpapratipattim antareṇopādānaparihārāv upapadyete, anyasmin pratīte 'nyatra pravṛttāv atiprasaṅgāt. vidhipratiṣedhāṅgatvāt pravṛttinivṛttiparatvam, na svarūpārthatvam iti cet, na; svarūpapratipattim antareṇa tatas tanniyatayoḥ pravṛttinivṛttyor ayogāt. na hi śaśaviṣāṇādivacasāṃ vidhyaṅgatvenāpi prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttinivṛttiparatvaṃ ca santo 'numanyante. tasmād "ātmā vāre draṣṭavyaḥ" ityādividhyaṅgatve 'pi jagatsraṣṭṛtvasarvajñatvādivacanānāṃ ghṛtayūpādivacasām iva yathārthatvam eva svarūpārthatvād iti.
analyzed: na svarūpa pratipattau aprāmāṇyam eṣām pratipattavyam medhya amedhya tva sva rūpa pratipādakānām svarga naraka ādi sva rūpa tad sādhana aṅga sva rūpa pratipādakānām ca vākyānām prāmāṇya upapatteḥ na hi sva rūpa pratipattim antareṇa upādāna parihārau upapadyete anyasmin pratīte nyatra pravṛttau atiprasaṅgāt vidhi pratiṣedha aṅga tvāt pravṛtti nivṛtti paratvam na svarūpa artha tvam iti ced na sva rūpa pratipattim antareṇa tatas tad niyatayoḥ pravṛtti

original: {ātmajñānasya mokṣārthatā}
analyzed: ātma jñānasya mokṣa artha tā

original: yac coktam — ātmajñānaṃ yāgapravṛttyarthaṃ vihitam, na tu mokṣārtham; aśrutatvād iti, tad ayuktam; vedasya prāmāṇyaniścaye 'rthinām ātmājñānaṃ vināpy agnihotrādijñānād eva pravṛttir bhavati, arthāpattito vātmāpi jñāyate. aprāmāṇye tv ātmajñānavidhāne 'pi na pravṛttiḥ. tasmān na yāgapravṛttyartham ātmajñānaṃ vihitam, kiṃ tu mokṣārthaṃ; vākyāntareṣu śrutatvāt — "vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt" , "tam eva viditvātimṛtyam eti. nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya" ity evamādiṣu. yāgārthatvaṃ ca vākyāntare 'pi na śrutam ity apramāṇakam eva kalpitam. tasmād "yāvaj jīvam agnihotraṃ juhuyāt" ityāder iva vākyāntaroktaphalena sambandho veditavyaḥ, "yasya yenārthasambandhaḥ" ityādinyāyena. anyathā niṣphalo vidhir na kenacid anuṣṭhīyata iti anarthakaḥ syāt. pratyavāyaparihārārtham anuṣṭhīyata iti cet, na; tasyāpy aśrutatvāt. śrutahānyaśrutakalpanā doṣaś caivaṃ syāt. tasmān muktyartham ātmajñānaṃ vihitam.
analyzed: yat ca uktam ātma jñānam yāga pravṛtti artham vihitam na tu mokṣa artham aśruta tvāt iti tat ayuktam vedasya prāmāṇya niścaye rthinām ātma ajñānam vinā api agnihotra ādi jñānāt eva pravṛttiḥ bhavati arthāpattitaḥ vā ātmā api jñāyate aprāmāṇye tu ātma jñāna vidhāne na pravṛttiḥ tasmāt na yāga pravṛtti artham ātma jñānam vihitam kim tu mokṣa artham vākya antareṣu śruta tvāt veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt ta

original: sa cātmā kiṃdharmako draṣṭavya ity apekṣāyāṃ pūrvoktāni vākyāni "arūpam arasam agandhavat" evamādīni ca sambadhyante. evaṃ cāgama bādhitvenāpy aprāmāṇyam īśvarapratiṣedhahetūnāṃ draṣṭavyam.
analyzed: sa ca ātmā kiṃdharmakaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti apekṣāyām pūrva uktāni vākyāni arūpam arasam a gandhavat evamādīni ca sambadhyante evam ca āgama bādhi tvena api aprāmāṇyam īśvara pratiṣedha hetūnām draṣṭavyam

original: {īśvarasarvajñatvasādhananirāsaḥ}
analyzed: īśvara sarvajña tva sādhana nirāsaḥ

original: etenāsarvārtham īśvarajñānatvād asmadādijñānavad ity evamāder api dharmigrāhakapramāṇabādhitatvam āśrayāsiddhatvaṃ vā pūrvoktaṃ draṣṭavyam. na hy asarvajñatve bhagavato 'nanta kāryotpattiḥ sambhavaty anadhiṣṭhitebhyo 'cetanahetubhyaḥ kāryotpattyasambhavād aniścitakārakaśakter adhiṣṭhātṛtvāsambhavāc cety uktaṃ samastakāryāṇām upādānādyavaboddhṛtve ca siddhaṃ sarvajñatvam iti.
analyzed: etena asarva artham īśvara jñāna tvāt asmat ādi jñāna vat iti evamādeḥ api dharmi grāhaka pramāṇa bādhita tvam āśraya asiddha tvam vā pūrva uktam draṣṭavyam na hi asarvajña tve bhagavataḥ nanta kārya utpattiḥ sambhavati anadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ cetana hetubhyaḥ kārya utpatti asambhavāt aniścita kāraka śakteḥ adhiṣṭhātṛ tva asambhavāt ca iti uktam samasta kāryāṇām upādāna ādi avaboddhṛ tve ca siddham sarvajña tvam iti

original: {bhāṭṭākṣepas tadapākaraṇaṃ ca}
analyzed: bhāṭṭa ākṣepaḥ tad apākaraṇam ca

original: tataś ca yad uktam —
analyzed: tatas ca yat uktam

original: "sarvajño dṛśyate tāvan nedānīm asmadādibhiḥ /
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ dṛśyate tāvat nā idānīm asmat ādibhiḥ

original: nirākaraṇavac chakyā na cāsīd iti kalpanā //"
analyzed: nirākaraṇa vat śakyā na ca āsīt iti kalpanā

original: "sarvajño 'yam iti hy evaṃ tatkālair api boddhṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ yam iti hi evam tad kālaiḥ api boddhṛbhiḥ

original: tajjñānajñeyavijñānarahitair jñāyate katham //"
analyzed: tad jñāna jñeya vijñāna rahitaiḥ jñāyate katham

original: na hy asarvajñaḥ sarvajñaṃ jānātīti, tad apāstam; tajjñānajñeyavijñānarahitatve 'pi hi laukikaiḥ śāstraśilpādyabhijñās tacchiṣyaiś ca jñāyante. anyathā jñānopārjanārthaṃ teṣāṃ śāstraśravaṇādiṣu pravṛttir na syāt. yathā ca śāstrādyanabhijñaiḥ śāstrādyabhijñas tatkāryeṇāptavacanena ca niścīyate, tadvad asarvajñair api sarvajña iti.
analyzed: na hi asarvajñaḥ sarvajñam jānāti iti tat apāstam tad jñāna jñeya vijñāna rahita tve hi laukikaiḥ śāstra śilpa ādi abhijñāḥ tad śiṣyaiḥ ca jñāyante anyathā jñāna upārjana artham teṣām śāstra śravaṇa ādiṣu pravṛttiḥ na syāt yathā ca śāstra ādi anabhijñaiḥ śāstra ādi abhijñaḥ tad kāryeṇa āpta vacanena ca niścīyate tadvat asarvajñaiḥ api sarvajñaḥ iti

original: {prathamasargāparijñatvaśaṅkāparihāraḥ}

yac coktam — prathamasargāparijñatvam, tatparijñāne ca saṃsārānāditvavirodha iti, tad atijāḍyavijṛmbhitam; na hi kharamastake viṣāṇam apaśyann andho bhavati. yad asti tat sarvaṃ paśyatīty asataḥ prathamasargāder adarśane 'pi sarvajñatvaṃ na vihanyate. kutsitarasāsvādanād apy ayuktam. yasya hīndriyeṇa rasagandhādiviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇataḥ sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣādiyogo bhavati, tasyāsvādanādivyapadeśas tatkṛtadoṣo vā. bhagavatas tu nendriyajaṃ jñānam, nāpi rāgaḥ kvacid dveṣo vā, nāpi kiṃcit pavitram apavitraṃ vā. kin tu yad yathāvasthitaṃ kiṃcit tat tathā veti nityenaiva jñānena, "paśyaty acakṣuḥ" ityādivacanāt.
analyzed: yat ca uktam prathama sarga aparijña tvam tad parijñāne ca saṃsāra anādi tva virodhaḥ iti tat ati jāḍya vijṛmbhitam na hi khara mastake viṣāṇam a paśyan andhaḥ bhavati yat asti tat sarvam paśyati iti asataḥ prathama sarga ādeḥ adarśane sarvajña tvam na vihanyate kutsita rasa āsvādanāt api ayuktam yasya hi indriyeṇa rasa gandha ādi viśeṣam gṛhṇataḥ sukha duḥkha rāga dveṣa ādi yogaḥ bhavati tasya āsvādana ādi vyapadeśaḥ tad kṛta doṣaḥ vā bhaga

original: {īśvārajñānasya pratyakṣatvam}
analyzed: īśvāra jñānasya pratyakṣa tvam

original: cakṣuṣā vinā kathaṃ paśyatīti vyavahāra iti cet, upacārāt. tajjñānasyāparisphuṭatvāśaṅkānivṛttir upacārasya prayojanam, nimittaṃ punaś cākṣuṣena jñānena, sādharmyam īśvarajñānasyāparokṣākāratvam. tasya hi svakaratalavat sarvo 'rtho 'parokṣa eveti. etena pratyakṣavyavahāro 'pi vyākhyātaḥ — pramājanakatvābhāvān neśvarajñānaṃ mukhyaṃ pratyakṣam, nāpy akṣajanyatvena pratyakṣam, nityatvāt.
analyzed: cakṣuṣā vinā katham paśyati iti vyavahāraḥ iti ced upacārāt tad jñānasya aparisphuṭa tva āśaṅkā nivṛttiḥ upacārasya prayojanam nimittam punar cākṣuṣena jñānena sādharmyam īśvara jñānasya aparokṣa ākāra tvam tasya hi sva kara tala vat sarvaḥ rthaḥ parokṣaḥ eva iti etena pratyakṣa vyavahāraḥ vyākhyātaḥ pramā janaka tva abhāvāt na īśvara jñānam mukhyam pratyakṣam na api akṣa janya tvena pratyakṣam nitya tvāt

original: {īśvarajñānasya nityatvasādhanam}
analyzed: īśvara jñānasya nitya tva sādhanam

original: nityatvaṃ kuta iti cet, anumānād āgamāc ca. tatra nityaṃ parameśvarajñānaṃ gandhādharmadhvanisamavāyikāraṇārthāntaranityadravyaviśeṣaguṇatvāt, toyādiparamāṇurūpādivad ity anumānam. gandhādharmadhvanināṃ samavāyikāraṇāni kṣityaparātmākāśāni, tebhyo 'rthāntaraṃ yan nityaṃ dravyaṃ tadguṇatvād ity arthaḥ. tatra kāryatoyādiguṇair vyabhicāranivṛttyarthaṃ nityadravyaguṇagrahaṇam, nityadravyaguṇaiḥ saṃyogādibhir vyabhicāranivṛttyarthaṃ viśeṣaguṇagrahaṇam. tathāpi pākajaiḥ, aparātmaviśeṣaguṇaiḥ, śabdena ca vyabhicāraḥ, tannivṛttyarthaṃ gandhādharmetyādiviśeṣaṇam. nanu paramayogī gandhādisamavāyikāraṇebhyo 'rthāntaram, tasya viśeṣaguṇo jñānam, tac cānityam ity anekāntaḥ, naitad asti; na hi karoti — ity eva kāraṇam, kiṃ tarhi? kariṣyaty akārṣīd ity api. yasmād "anirdiṣṭakālāḥ pratyayās triṣv api kāleṣu bhavanti" — iti śabdavidaḥ. tataḥ kāraṇād idaṃ kāryaṃ niṣpannam ityādivyavahāro 'py asti, kāryakāraṇānumānayor atītānāgataviṣayatvaprasiddheś ca.
analyzed: nitya tvam kutas iti ced anumānāt āgamāt ca tatra nityam parameśvara jñānam gandha adharma dhvani samavāyi kāraṇa artha antara nitya dravya viśeṣa guṇa tvāt toya ādi paramāṇu rūpa ādi vat iti anumānam gandha adharma dhvaninām samavāyi kāraṇāni kṣiti apara ātma ākāśāni tebhyaḥ rtha antaram yat nityam dravyam tad guṇa tvāt iti arthaḥ tatra kārya toya ādi guṇaiḥ vyabhicāra nivṛtti artham nitya dravya guṇa grahaṇam nitya dravya guṇaiḥ saṃyoga ādib

original: tad ayam artho gandhādharmetyādivākyasya — nityaṃ parameśvarajñānam, kṣityākāśasaṃsāripuruṣān āśritatve sati nityadravyaviśeṣaguṇatvāc chalilādiparamāṇurūpādivad iti. parameśvarecchāprayatnābhyām anekānta iti cet, na; tayor apy ata eva hetor nityatvasiddheḥ, sādhyena vyabhicārābhāvāc ceti.
analyzed: tat ayam arthaḥ gandha adharma ityādi vākyasya nityam parameśvara jñānam kṣiti ākāśa saṃsāri puruṣān āśrita tve sati nitya dravya viśeṣa guṇa tvāt śalila ādi paramāṇu rūpa ādi vat iti parameśvara icchā prayatnābhyām anekāntaḥ iti ced na tayoḥ api atas eva hetoḥ nitya tva siddheḥ sādhyena vyabhicāra abhāvāt ca iti

original: {kevalavyatirekito nityajñānāśrayatvasiddhiḥ}

kevalavyatirekī vā hetus tathā hi — nityajñānāśrayo bhagavān, niratiśayakartṛtvāt, vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto 'smadādiḥ. aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣa iti cet, na; aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvād eva kevalavyatirekitvam, viśeṣaṇaprasiddhau hy anvayo 'pi syāt. aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ ca doṣam abhyupagacchataḥ sarvānityavādinaṃ pratyākāśādau nityatvasiddhir anumānān na syāt. na cāsmadādipratyakṣeṇa kvacin na nityatvaṃ gṛhyate, anādyanantasattāyāḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratibhāsanāt. anityatvaṃ ghaṭādiṣu dṛṣṭam, tadākāśādau pratiṣidhyata iti, tataḥ kathaṃ nityatvasiddhiḥ? sāmarthyād iti cet, kim idaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāma? na hi pratyakṣāgamavyatiriktam anumānād anyatpratipattisādhanam asti. athānumānam eva sāmarthyam, tato 'pi nityatvasiddhau kathaṃ nāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvam? kiṃ cātrāpy asmadādau nityajñānānāśrayatvaṃ dṛṣṭam, tadīśvare pratiṣidhyate, tatpratiṣedhe ca sāmarthyān nityajñānāśrayatvasiddhir iti. yady evaṃ nityajñānānāśrayo bhagavān na bhavatīty evaṃ sādhyanirdeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. ko 'tra viśeṣaḥ? evaṃ kāraṇe 'pi sa evārthaḥ, pratiṣedhadvayasya vidhyarthatvāt.
analyzed: kevala vyatirekī vā hetuḥ tathā hi nitya jñāna āśrayaḥ bhagavān niratiśaya kartṛ tvāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ smad ādiḥ aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ iti ced na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvāt eva kevala vyatireki tvam viśeṣaṇa prasiddhau hi syāt aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam ca doṣam abhyupagacchataḥ sarva anitya vādinam prati ākāśa ādau nitya tva siddhiḥ anumānāt na syāt na ca asmad ādi pratyakṣeṇa kvacid na nitya tvam gṛhyate anādi ananta satt

original: {vyāptyasiddhyāśaṃkā tannirāsaś ca}

nanu ca nityajñānāśrayatvaniratiśayakartṛtvayoḥ pratibandhāsiddher nityajñānāśrayatvanivṛttāv eva niratiśayakartṛtvanivṛttir ayuktā, nityaduḥkhādyāśrayatvanivṛttāv api tannivṛttiprasaṅgāt. tataś ca niratiśayakartṛtvena nityajñānāśrayatvasiddhivan nityaduḥkhāśrayatvasiddhir api syāt. vipakṣadarśanāvyabhicārasyobhayatraviśeṣād iti, naitad asti; nityajñānāśrayatvena hi niratiśayakartṛtvasya vyāptipratipakṣabādhakapramāṇaiḥ kākatīrādarśananyāyena pakṣa eva siddhyati. na tv evaṃ nityaduḥkhādyāśrayatvena tadasiddhāv eva niratiśayakartṛtvopapatteḥ? sarvadāniḥśeṣakāryotpādanasāmarthyaṃ hi niratiśayakartṛtvam ucyate tac ca duḥkhādimātreṇāpy abhibhūtasya nopapadyate, kuto nityair duḥkhadveṣādibhir abhibhūtasyeti? tathā śaśaviṣāṇādyāśrayatvasiddhir api na codanīyā, tadabhāvena niratiśayakartṛtvasya virodhāsiddheḥ.
analyzed: nanu ca nitya jñāna āśraya tva niratiśaya kartṛ tvayoḥ pratibandha asiddheḥ nitya jñāna āśraya tva nivṛttau eva niratiśaya kartṛ tva nivṛttiḥ ayuktā nitya duḥkha ādi āśraya tva nivṛttau api tad nivṛtti prasaṅgāt tatas ca niratiśaya kartṛ tvena nitya jñāna āśraya tva siddhi vat nitya duḥkha āśraya tva siddhiḥ api syāt vipakṣa darśana avyabhicārasya ubhayatra viśeṣāt iti na etat asti nitya jñāna āśraya tvena hi niratiśaya kartṛ tvasya vyāpti

original: {nityajñānāśrayatvam antarā jagatkartṛtvāsambhavaḥ}

na caivaṃ nityajñānāśrayatvena vinā niratiśayakartṛtvam upapadyate, tathā hi — acetanasyāsarvajñasya vā bhuvanādyaśeṣakāryakartṛtvaṃ na sambhavatīty uktam. sarvajñatvaṃ cānādyanantakālam avyucchedena bhagavato 'bhyupagantavyam, avyucchedenātra — trasasthāvarādyanantakāryotpattidarśanāt. tac ca sātatyena sarvārthaviṣayatvaṃ sahetukatve jñānasya na syāt. na hy ekākārakāryotpādakakāraṇasāmagrīṇām aviguṇānāṃ pūrvāparakālāvacchinnaḥ santānaḥ sambhavati, anityānāṃ khalu parādhīnātmalābhatayotkarṣāpakarṣādiyogasya kadācid avaśyaṃbhāvitvena sambhāvyatvān na tatsāmagryāyattajanmano jñānasya niratiśayo 'vadhivarjitaḥ santāna upapadyate.
analyzed: na ca evam nitya jñāna āśraya tvena vinā niratiśaya kartṛ tvam upapadyate tathā hi acetanasya asarvajñasya vā bhuvana ādi aśeṣa kārya kartṛ tvam na sambhavati iti uktam sarvajña tvam ca anādi ananta kālam avyucchedena bhagavataḥ bhyupagantavyam avyucchedena atra trasa sthāvara ādi ananta kārya utpatti darśanāt tat ca sātatyena sarva artha viṣaya tvam sa hetuka tve jñānasya na syāt na hi eka ākāra kārya utpādaka kāraṇa sāmagrīṇām aviguṇānām pūrva apara kāl

original: kāraṇaṃ ceśvarajñānasyābhyupagacchatā paridṛṣṭasāmarthyam evābhyupagantavyam. dhūmāgnyādivatsāmarthyaṃ tu jñānotpattau śarīrendriyādeḥ sukhādyutpattau iva niścitam, śarīrādyutpattāv apy avidyātṛṣṇādeḥ sāmarthyaṃ niścitam, tenānityaṃ jñānam icchataḥ sarvasaṃsāridharmābhyupagamaḥ prasajyate. tataś ca niratiśayaṃ kartṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca virudhyate, tadvirodhāc ca jagadutpattivirodha iti.
analyzed: kāraṇam ca īśvara jñānasya abhyupagacchatā paridṛṣṭa sāmarthyam eva abhyupagantavyam dhūma agni ādi vat sāmarthyam tu jñāna utpattau śarīra indriya ādeḥ sukha ādi utpattau iva niścitam śarīra ādi utpattau api avidyā tṛṣṇā ādeḥ sāmarthyam niścitam tena anityam jñānam icchataḥ sarva saṃsāri dharma abhyupagamaḥ prasajyate tatas ca niratiśayam kartṛ tvam sarvajña tvam ca virudhyate tad virodhāt ca jagat utpatti virodhaḥ iti

original: {śarīrādyabhāvān nityaṃ jñānam}
analyzed: śarīra ādi abhāvāt nityam jñānam

original: nityaṃ śarīram indriyaṃ ca bhagavata iti cet, na; pramāṇābhāvāt, yuktivirodhāc ca. evam eva nityatvābhyupagame ca patnyādayo 'pi nityā eṣṭavyāḥ. paramāṇvādy eva śarīram ity apy ayuktam, ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayatvābhāvāt. bhogāyatanaṃ ca śarīram ucyate, na ca bhagavataḥ kiṃcid bhogāyatanam asti. kṣityādimūrtipratipādakāgamavirodha iti cet, na; tasyopacāreṇa pravṛtteḥ śarīravad icchāmātrānuvidhāyitvāt. anyathā yajamāno 'pi śarīraṃ syāt. na ca cetanaṃ śarīraṃ yuktam. tathendriyasyāpi nityatvam ayuktam, ākāśamanasor apy adṛṣṭopagṛhītatvenendriyatvāt, tadvaikalye vānindriyatvāt. na ceśvarasya dharmo 'dharmo vāsti, asaṃsāritvavirodhāt. kevaladharmāstitve ca pramāṇābhāvāt. nityānityavikalpāsambhavāt — nityatve ca jñānam eva nityam astu, kalpanāgauravaparihāraś caivaṃ bhavaty anityatve ca tatsādhanam anutiṣṭhataḥ saṃhārakartṛtvādivirodhaḥ, paraduḥkhotpādanāder adharmahetutvāt. yac coktam ajñānam evādharmahetus tadabhāvād viśeṣato 'pi nādharma iti, tad ayuktam; jānataḥ pratiṣiddhācaraṇe 'syābhyadhikaprāyaścittaśravaṇāt. kṣīṇadoṣasya nādharmotpattir iti cet, dharmotpādo 'pi tasya nāsti tulyapramāṇatvāt. tad evaṃ jñānotpādakahetoḥ śarīrāder abhāvān nityam eva jñānaṃ bhagavata iti.
analyzed: nityam śarīram indriyam ca bhagavataḥ iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt yukti virodhāt ca evam eva nitya tva abhyupagame ca patnī ādayaḥ pi nityāḥ eṣṭavyāḥ paramāṇu ādi eva śarīram iti api ayuktam ceṣṭa indriya artha āśraya tva abhāvāt bhoga āyatanam ca śarīram ucyate na ca bhagavataḥ kiṃcid bhoga āyatanam asti kṣiti ādi mūrti pratipādaka āgama virodhaḥ iti ced na tasya upacāreṇa pravṛtteḥ śarīra vat icchā mātra anuvidhāyi tvāt anyathā śarīram

original: nanu ca jñānamātrasyānityatvenāvyabhicāritvāt kathaṃ kasyacin nityatvasiddhiḥ? siddhau vā na kenāpi kasyacid avinābhāvasiddhiḥ, sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgād iti, naitad asti; sātiśayasyaiva hi jñānasyānityatvenāvyabhicāra upalabdho, na niratiśayasya, mahattvāṇutvādivat. yaiś ca pratipakṣabādhakapramāṇair nityajñānāśrayatvaniratiśaya kartṛtvayoḥ pratibandhaḥ prasādhitaḥ tair evānityatvasādhanasya jñānatvavibhudravyaviśeṣaguṇatvāder bādhitatvād aprāmāṇyam eva draṣṭavyam. na hi yathā jñānatvavibhudravyaviśeṣaguṇāder nityatvena saha virodhaḥ kaścid asti yena niratiśayakartṛtvasya nityajñānaviparyayeṇa virodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ, tathā jñānatvāder anityatvena na vyabhicāraḥ sidhyet. na ca vipakṣādarśanamātreṇāvyabhicārasiddhiḥ, atiprasaṅgāt. na cānyatrādarśanam eva virodho, mahattvāṇutvāder api nityatvena virodhaprasaṅgāt, na caivaṃ paridṛṣṭasāmarthyakāraṇābhāvo 'pi parameśvarajñānasya kāraṇāntarād utpattāv avirodhaḥ, paridṛṣṭasāmarthyakāraṇābhāve kāraṇāntarāt kāryotpādavirodhasya dṛṣṭapramāṇasiddhatvād agnidhūmādiṣu. anyathā kṣityāder apy upalabdhopādānādisāmarthyakartur abhāve 'pi kāraṇāntarebhyaḥ kāryotpattāv avirodhaprasaṅgāt. tataś ceśvarasiddhir eva nāsti kasya jñānaṃ nityam anityaṃ vā cintyeta? tasmāt kṣityādikāryānumānasya balīyastvāt tatkartur yathā digdeśakālānavacchinnānantatatkāryotpādakatvānyathānupapattyāsmadādidharmair duḥkhāsarvajñatvādibhir asaṃsparśo 'numīyate. tadvad anityajñānadharmaśarīrādyapekṣakartṛtvābhāvo 'pīti. tathā ca "satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma" iti śrutiḥ, "na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca" ityādinā "apāṇipādaḥ" ādivākyena cākṛtakaṃ jñānam, niṣkalasya kartṛtvaṃ ca bhagavataḥ pratipāditam. icchāprayatnayor apy ata eva nityatvaṃ siddham, śarīrādyabhāve tayor apy utpatter asambhavāt. nityatvenaikatve 'pi tayoḥ kāryabhedena bhedas traikālikatvaṃ copacaryate, jñeyabhedena jñānavat. yad atrānuktaṃ paroktacodyapratisamādhānaṃ pratipakṣabādhakaṃ ca, tat "nityajñānaviniścaye" draṣṭavyaṃ svayaṃ cānyad apy ūhyam.

nanu ca nityasyaikajñānasya sarvārthaviṣayatve 'tītānāgatārthānām api vartamānatvaprasaṅgaḥ, ekajñānālambanatvāt, kṛtikādivad iti, naitad asti; yogijñānaṃ khalv ekam apy atītānāgatavartamānārthaviṣayaṃ samādhibalād bhavati, na ca sarvārthānāṃ vartamānatvam. yathā vā sattākhyenaikena sāmānyena sambaddhānām arthānāṃ naikadeśatvam ekasvabhāvatvaṃ vā, pratyakṣādivirodhāt. tatra keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ deśāntaraṃ gacchatāṃ na sattayā sahagamanam, nāpi sattāviyogaḥ. tad ekasambandhitve teṣāṃ pūrvadeśādyaparityāgo 'pi nāsti — etac ca sāmānyasamarthane vistareṇa prasādhitam. tadvan maheśvarajñānenaikena sambaddhānām arthānāṃ naikakālādiyoga ity anāgato 'rthaḥ parameśvarajñānaviṣayaḥ svakāraṇasāmarthyād vartamānībhavan nāgamam eva svabhāvaṃ hitvā bhavati, na tu īśvarajñānasambandhaṃ jahāti. vartamānasvabhāvaṃ hitvātītabhāvam upagacchan neśvarajñānasambandhaṃ jahāti — ity evaṃ ca sati yaḥ kaścid arthaḥ pūrvadharma sadrūpam asadrūpaṃ vā parityajya dharmāntaram āpadyate, sa sarvaḥ parameśvarajñānasambaddha evāpadyate, sattāsambandhavad iti.

original: kiṃ ca kenāpi prajñākṛtānāṃ citrādikāryaviśeṣāṇām, na sarveṣāṃ saṃsthānam atiśobhanaṃ bhavati. yathaiva hi prekṣāvān eva citrakārādiḥ vicitraṃ kāryaṃ kartum icchan kiṃcit śobhanasaṃsthānam, kiṃcin madhyamasaṃsthānaṃ karoti; tathā bhagavān api sarvajña eva vicitrasaṃsthānaṃ jagat karotīti. atha vā śarīrendriyavad bhūmyādikam api prāṇikarmānurūpaṃ bhagavān karoti — tatra devānāṃ dharmabahulatvād atiśobhanaṃ saṃsthānam eva tadbhūmyādikaṃ karoti, nārakiṇāṃ tv adharmabahulatvāt tadbhūmyādikam aśobhanasaṃsthānam eva karoti, idaṃ bhūbhūdharākhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣadharmādharmavipākavatāṃ prāṇināṃ sthānam, tena tatsukhaduḥkhaprakāranimittaṃ kṛtavān iti.
analyzed: kim ca kena api prajñā kṛtānām citra ādi kārya viśeṣāṇām na sarveṣām saṃsthānam ati śobhanam bhavati yathā eva hi prekṣāvān eva citrakāra ādiḥ vicitram kāryam kartum icchan kiṃcid śobhana saṃsthānam kiṃcid madhyama saṃsthānam karoti tathā bhagavān api sarvajñaḥ eva vicitra saṃsthānam jagat karoti iti atha vā śarīra indriya vat bhūmi ādikam api prāṇi karma anurūpam bhagavān karoti tatra devānām dharma bahula tvāt ati śobhanam saṃsthānam eva

original: (cha) yat punaḥ "jātyantare prasiddhasya" ityādiślokadvayam; tad apy ayuktam; na hi yathā vāgādiṣu navasv artheṣv abhinnaṃ nimittaṃ vinaiva gośabdaḥ pravṛttas tathā kṣityādiṣv apīti. yadi hi ghaṭādiṣu kṣityādiṣu caikaṃ vastugataṃ kāryatvādilakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ nāsti, tataḥ kathaṃ saṃsthānatvena kāryatvaṃ sādhyate, kāryatvenānityatvam iti? na hy atra viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti, yenānityatvasādhane kṣityādiṣu kāryaśabdasāmyamātratvenāsiddhaṃ na bhavati, buddhimadadhiṣṭhātṛpūrvakatvasādhane tv asiddham. ubhayatrāpi ghaṭādir eva dṛṣṭāntas tatrānityatvena yathā kāryatvasya vyāptiḥ prasiddhā, tathā buddhimadadhiṣṭhātṛpūrvakatvenety ubhayoḥ siddhir asiddhir vāstu. na cācetanānāṃ viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti, yena bhaṭādihetava evācetanā buddhimadanadhiṣṭhā na pravartante. kṣityādihetavas tv acetanā api buddhimadanadhiṣṭhā eva pravartanta iti.
analyzed: yat punar jāti antare prasiddhasya ityādi śloka dvayam tat api ayuktam na hi yathā vāc ādiṣu navasu artheṣu abhinnam nimittam vinā eva go śabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ tathā kṣiti ādiṣu api iti yadi hi ghaṭa ādiṣu kṣiti ādiṣu ca ekam vastugatam kāryatva ādi lakṣaṇam sāmānyam na asti tatas katham saṃsthāna tvena kāryatvam sādhyate kāryatvena anitya tvam iti na hi atra viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti yena anitya tva sādhane kṣiti ādiṣu kārya śabda sāmya mātra tvena asid

original: {nityatvādisāmānye 'pīśvarasyaiva kartṛtvam, nākāśādeḥ}
analyzed: nitya tva ādi sāmānye pi īśvarasya eva kartṛ tvam na ākāśa ādeḥ

original: yat punar etat — "nityavyāpitvādyaviśeṣe 'pīśvara eva kāraṇam, nākāśam iti kuto 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ"? iti, tad apy avicāritārtham; kāryānumānenaiva vibhāgasya pradarśitatvāt. kumbhādau dṛṣṭānte hi buddhimān eva kartā laukikaparīkṣāṇāṃ prasiddhaḥ, na tv ākāśam, tena kṣityādau sādhye 'pi buddhimān eva kartā sidhyati. sa eveśvaraḥ, anīśvarasya tatra sāmarthyābhāvād ity uktam. etena "śāstrauṣadhādisambandhād" ityādy api nirastam. yadi nāma vraṇarohaṇādiṣu sthāṇoḥ kāraṇatvaṃ pramāṇābhāvān na kalpyate, bhagavataḥ kṣityādiṣu kāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate? na hy atrāpi pramāṇābhāvaḥ, nāpīśvaraḥ pratyakṣaḥ, yena sthāṇuvad asya kṣityādikāryaṃ praty asambaddhatā gṛhyate.
analyzed: yat punar etat nitya vyāpi tva ādi aviśeṣe pi īśvaraḥ eva kāraṇam na ākāśam iti kutas yam vibhāgaḥ iti tat api avicārita artham kārya anumānena eva vibhāgasya pradarśita tvāt kumbha ādau dṛṣṭānte hi buddhimān eva kartā laukika parīkṣāṇām prasiddhaḥ na tu ākāśam tena kṣiti ādau sādhye buddhimān eva kartā sidhyati saḥ eva īśvaraḥ anīśvarasya tatra sāmarthya abhāvāt iti uktam etena śāstra auṣadha ādi sambandhāt ityādi api nirastam yadi nām

original: {nirvyāpārasyeśvarasya kartṛtvaśaṅkānirāsaḥ}

atha matam — nirvyāpārasya kāraṇatvaṃ na yuktam, vyāpāraś ceśvarasya svabhāvabhedena vinā na yujyata iti. svabhāvabhedena vineti ko 'rthaḥ? kiṃ sahakāribhedena vinā? kiṃ vā dharmabhedena vinā? āhosvid ātmabhedena vineti? tatra yadi sahakāribhedena vineti abhipretam, tato 'siddham; yasmād īśvarasyāpi sahakāribhedo 'sty eva. tad atadrūpākaraṇe 'pi yathā na sahakārivaiyarthyam, tathā vakṣyāmaḥ. atha dharmabhedena vinety abhipretam, tad apy asiddham; bhagavato 'pi dharmāṇāṃ sarvajñatvajagatkartṛtvanityatvādīnāṃ parasparabhedopapatteḥ. atha dharmāṇāṃ bhedena vināśena vinety abhipretam, tad apy asiddham; saṃyogādidharmāṇāṃ vināśopapatteḥ. atha sarvadharmavināśena vinā vyāpāro na yujyata iti, tad apy ayuktam; sarvadharmavināśe tu prārabdhasya vyāpārāsambhavāt. athātmabhedena vinety arthaḥ, tatreśvarātmā kiṃ parasmān na bhidyate? kiṃ vā svasmād iti? parasmān na bhidyata ity ayuktam, advaitaprasaṅgāt. advaitaṃ ca nirākariṣyāmaḥ. atha svasmān na bhidyate, tadānyasyāpi kārakasya svasmād bhedo nāstīti na vyāpāraḥ syāt, tataḥ sarvaṃ jagan niṣkāraṇaṃ syāt. atha svabhāvabhedaḥ svātmavināśas tena vinā vyāpāro na yujyate, tat kim idānīṃ vinaṣṭasya vyāpāraḥ sambhavatīti? athājanakasvabhāvanivṛttau janakasvabhāvasyotpattau ca vyāpāraḥ sambhavati, na nityasyeti; etac ca kṣaṇikatvapratiṣedhe nirākariṣyāmaḥ.
analyzed: atha matam nirvyāpārasya kāraṇa tvam na yuktam vyāpāraḥ ca īśvarasya svabhāva bhedena vinā na yujyate iti svabhāva bhedena vinā iti kaḥ rthaḥ kim sahakāri bhedena vinā kim vā dharma bhedena vinā āhosvit ātma bhedena vinā iti tatra yadi sahakāri bhedena vinā iti abhipretam tatas siddham yasmāt īśvarasya api sahakāri bhedaḥ sti eva tat a tad rūpa akaraṇe yathā na sahakāri vaiyarthyam tathā vakṣyāmaḥ atha dharma bhedena vinā iti abhipretam tat api asiddham bhagava

original: {nityasya sāmarthyaṃ na duranvayam}
analyzed: nityasya sāmarthyam na duranvayam

original: (jha) yat punar etat — "nityasyāvyatirekitvāt sāmarthyaṃ duranvayam" iti, tad ayuktam; tatsattvagrāhakapramāṇād eva sāmarthyasiddheḥ, na hy anyathā kṣityādikāryotpattiḥ sambhavatīty uktam. gotvādeś ca sāmānyasya nityatve 'py anugatavyāvṛttagopratyayādiṣu sāmarthyaṃ vistareṇa prasādhitam. ataś ca na nityasya sāmarthyaṃ duranvayam iti.
analyzed: yat punar etat nityasya avyatireki tvāt sāmarthyam duranvayam iti tat ayuktam tad sattva grāhaka pramāṇāt eva sāmarthya siddheḥ na hi anyathā kṣiti ādi kārya utpattiḥ sambhavati iti uktam go tva ādeḥ ca sāmānyasya nitya tve pi anugata vyāvṛtta go pratyaya ādiṣu sāmarthyam vistareṇa prasādhitam atas ca na nityasya sāmarthyam duranvayam iti

original: {kāryasya cetanācetanapūrvakatvaśaṃkānirāsaḥ}

(ña) yady api "yeṣu satsu" — ityādi, tad apy ayuktam; karmāder apy akalpanāprasaṅgāt. na hi pitrādiṣu satsu bhavataḥ śarīrādeḥ karmatṛṣṇādikaṃ hetutvenopalabhyate, tatas tatkalpane 'pi hetūnām avasthitiḥ syāt. atha karmatṛṣṇāder ekatrasāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭvānyatrānumānena gamyate? buddhimadadhiṣṭhātur apy ekatra sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭvānyatrānumānena kiṃ na gamyate? yatra dṛṣṭam, tatra gamyatām, na kṣityādyupādānopakaraṇeṣv iti cet, karmatṛṣṇāder api yatra sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam, tatra gamyatām, na garbhaśarīrādiṣv iti. śarīratvādyaviśeṣād garbhaśarīrādiṣv api gamyata iti cet, acetanatvādyaviśeṣāt kṣityādyupādānopakaraṇeṣv api kiṃ na gamyate? buddhimato 'py adhiṣṭhātṛmātrasya sāmarthyaṃ gamyatām, neśvarasyādṛṣṭatvād iti cet, yady evaṃ karmatṛṣṇādimātrasya sādharmyaṃ gamyatāṃ na janmāntarotpannasyādṛṣṭatvāt. garbhaśarīrādihetoḥ sāmarthyāt janmāntarotpādasiddhir iti cet, yady evaṃ kṣityādyupādānādhiṣṭhātur buddhimataḥ sāmarthyād īśvaratvasiddhir iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ. tad evaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ buddhimat pūrvakatvasiddheḥ, kiṃcic cetanataḥ, kiṃcid anyataś cety etad apy ayuktam.
analyzed: yadi api yeṣu satsu ityādi tat api ayuktam karma ādeḥ api a kalpanā prasaṅgāt na hi pitṛ ādiṣu satsu bhavataḥ śarīra ādeḥ karma tṛṣṇā ādikam hetu tvena upalabhyate tatas tad kalpane hetūnām avasthitiḥ syāt atha karma tṛṣṇā ādeḥ ekatra sāmarthyam dṛṣṭvā anyatra anumānena gamyate buddhimat adhiṣṭhātuḥ api ekatra sāmarthyam dṛṣṭvā anyatra anumānena kim na gamyate yatra dṛṣṭam tatra gamyatām na kṣiti ādi upādāna upakaraṇeṣu i

original: tad etad ayuktam; na hi kulālasya kāraṇatve cakradaṇḍāder vaiyarthyaṃ cakrādinirbhartsya vā ghaṭādīnāṃ kulālaḥ kāraṇam, tadanirbhartsane vā naiva kāraṇam iti. bhinnapramāṇagrāhyatvāc ca. tathā hi — buddhimatpūrvakatvānumāneneśvaraḥ pratīyate, janmādivaicitryeṇa tu karmeti. vicitraṃ hi kāryaṃ vicitrakāraṇaprabhavaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā citrādi, tathā ca janmādikāryaṃ vicitraṃ dṛśyate.
analyzed: tat etat ayuktam na hi kulālasya kāraṇa tve cakra daṇḍa ādeḥ vaiyarthyam cakra ādi nirbhartsya vā ghaṭa ādīnām kulālaḥ kāraṇam tad anirbhartsane vā na eva kāraṇam iti bhinna pramāṇa grāhya tvāt ca tathā hi buddhimat pūrvakatva anumānena īśvaraḥ pratīyate janma ādi vaicitryeṇa tu karma iti vicitram hi kāryam vicitra kāraṇa prabhavam dṛṣṭam yathā citra ādi tathā ca janma ādi kāryam vicitram dṛśyate

original: tad apy ayuktam, na hi pariṇāmād eva hetus tathā hi — sthitopaviṣṭagacchatāṃ prāṇināṃ dhāraṇe svātmani jñānotpādane ca bhūmyādir avikṛto 'pi hetur upalabhyate. maṇiviśeṣaś ca niścalo 'pi jñānasukhādihetur dṛṣṭaḥ. keṣucit kāryeṣu svabhāvapariṇāmena hetutvasiddhau sarvasya tathaiva hetutvaṃ viśeṣābhāvād iti cet, na; kṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgāt. kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca niṣetsyāmaḥ.
analyzed: tat api ayuktam na hi pariṇāmāt eva hetuḥ tathā hi sthita upaviṣṭa gacchatām prāṇinām dhāraṇe svātmani jñāna utpādane ca bhūmi ādiḥ avikṛtaḥ pi hetuḥ upalabhyate maṇi viśeṣaḥ ca niścalaḥ api jñāna sukha ādi hetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ keṣucid kāryeṣu svabhāva pariṇāmena hetu tva siddhau sarvasya tathā eva hetu tvam viśeṣa abhāvāt iti ced na kṣaṇika tva prasaṅgāt kṣaṇika tvam ca niṣetsyāmaḥ

original: {acetanānāṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitatvasiddhiḥ}

kiṃ keṣāṃcid acetanānāṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitatvena hetutvasiddhau sarveṣām acetanatvāviśeṣāt tathātvaṃ kiṃ nānumīyate? bhūmisphaṭikādivikārasya hy anupalambhād abhāvaḥ sidhyaty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptitvāt, na tv adhiṣṭhātus tasyātīndriyatvāt. kulālāder aindriyakatvāt tasya kathaṃ nānupalambhād abhāvasiddhir iti cet, na; svavyatiriktasya cetanasyāpratyakṣatvāt. śarīramātraṃ tu kulālādeḥ pratyakṣam, tasya cānupalambhād abhāvaḥ sidhyatu, na tato 'nyasya buddhimata iti. dehābhāvasiddhāv etasyābhāvasiddhir adehasya kartṛtvānupalambhād iti cet, evaṃ tarhi mṛtasyāśarīratvāj janmāntarārambhakatvaṃ na syāt, tathopalambhābhāvāt. nāpi sadeha eva janmāntaram ārabhate, tathopalambhābhāvād eva na hy ekaṃ dehasantānaṃ tyaktvānyatra buddher anupraveśaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭaḥ. bālakaumārādibhedeṣu saṃkramaṇavad iti cet, na; avasthābhede 'py ekasantānatvāt. sa eva jīvatīti darśanāt. viparyayas tu janmāntareṇa ca buddhaśarīraṃ tyaktvā garbhaśarīrānupraveśaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ. svapne śarīrāntarānupraveśo dṛṣṭaḥ iti cet, na; tasya hi mithyātvāt. satyatve hi suptasya prāṇādinirodho 'py anyair upalabhyeta. na cāpādānakāraṇād viprakṛṣṭadeśe kāryotpattir dṛṣṭā tasmād yathādṛṣṭamātrānuvādināṃ paralokasiddhiḥ durlabheti. tasmāt kāryasāmānyena kāraṇasāmānyānumitau tatkāryaviśeṣānurūpas tatkāraṇaviśeṣo 'pi pratipattavyo 'nyathā tatsāmānyānumitir eva syād iti. yad apy uktam — "tasmāt pṛthag aśakteṣv" ityādi, tad apy ayuktam, yasmād atrāpi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi ghaṭādau cetanānāṃ kartṛkarmādīnāṃ pṛthag asāmarthyaṃ ca dṛṣṭam, tena kṣityādiṣv api saṃhatānām eva kartṛkarmādīnāṃ sāmarthyam anumīyate. teṣāṃ kartṛkarmādīnāṃ nityatvaṃ bhavatv anityatvaṃ vā, vyāpakatvam avyāpakatvaṃ vā. yathābhūtānāṃ tatkāryotpādakatvaṃ sambhavati, tathābhūtānām eva siddhir abhyupagantavyety alam asadgrahābhiniveśeneti.
analyzed: kim keṣāṃcid acetanānām cetanā dhiṣṭhita tvena hetu tva siddhau sarveṣām acetana tva aviśeṣāt tathātvam kim nā anumīyate bhūmi sphaṭika ādi vikārasya hi anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ sidhyati upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpti tvāt na tu adhiṣṭhātuḥ tasya atīndriya tvāt kulāla ādeḥ aindriyaka tvāt tasya katham na anupalambhāt abhāva siddhiḥ iti cet na sva vyatiriktasya cetanasya apratyakṣa tvāt śarīra mātram tu kulāla ādeḥ pratyakṣam tasya ca anupalambhāt ab

original: {aparātmavicāraḥ}
evaṃ tāvat paramātmā nirṇītaḥ sāmpratamaparamātmā vicāryate saṃsāraphalopabhoktā nāmānanto 'paraḥ. sa khalu buddhyādikāryaviśeṣāṇām āśrayabhūto 'numātavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam tāvat paramātmā nirṇītaḥ sāmpratam aparamātmā vicāryate saṃsāra phala upabhoktā nāma anantaḥ paraḥ sa khalu buddhi ādi kārya viśeṣāṇām āśraya bhūtaḥ

original: buddher ādayo buddhyādayo jñānāntā icchādaya ity arthaḥ. tathā ca sūtram — "icchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhajñānāny ātmano liṅgam". vaiśeṣikapāṭhaprasiddhyā tu buddhir ādir yeṣām iti draṣṭavyam. kathaṃ punar buddhyādibhir ātmānumīyate? tad ucyate — buddhyādayaḥ kvacit samavetāḥ, kāryatvāt, guṇatvād vā, rūpādivat. nanv atra sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ, rūpāder ātmāśritatvāprasiddheḥ. viruddhaś ca hetuḥ sādhyaviparyayeṇa vyāptatvād iti, naiṣa doṣaḥ; sāmānyenāśrayamātrāśritatvasādhanāt.
analyzed: buddheḥ ādayaḥ buddhi ādayaḥ jñāna antāḥ icchā ādayaḥ iti arthaḥ tathā ca sūtram icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam vaiśeṣika pāṭha prasiddhyā tu buddhiḥ ādiḥ yeṣām iti draṣṭavyam katham punar buddhi ādibhiḥ ātmā anumīyate tat ucyate buddhi ādayaḥ kvacid samavetāḥ kārya tvāt guṇa tvāt vā rūpa ādi vat nanu atra sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ rūpa ādeḥ ātma āśrita tva aprasiddheḥ viruddhaḥ ca hetu

original: {śarīrādīnāṃ buddhyāśrayatvapratiṣedhaḥ}
analyzed: śarīra ādīnām buddhi āśraya tva pratiṣedhaḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi siddhasādhyatā, buddhyādīnāṃ śarīrendriyāśritatvābhyupagamāt, naitad asti, yo hi buddhyādīnāṃ naivāśritatvaṃ gamyate taṃ prati tāvad āśritatvam eva sādhyate, tatsiddhau ca śarīrādyāśrayapratiṣedhād ātmasiddhir bhavati. tathā hi — śarīraṃ buddhyādyadhikaraṇaṃ na bhavati, bhūtakāryatvāt, ghaṭādivat.
analyzed: evam tarhi siddha sādhya tā buddhi ādīnām śarīra indriya āśrita tva abhyupagamāt na etat asti yaḥ hi buddhi ādīnām na eva āśrita tvam gamyate tam prati tāvat āśrita tvam eva sādhyate tad siddhau ca śarīra ādi āśraya pratiṣedhāt ātma siddhiḥ bhavati tathā hi śarīram buddhi ādi adhikaraṇam na bhavati bhūta kārya tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat

original: {na sādhyahīnaṃ nidarśanam}
analyzed: na sādhya hīnam nidarśanam

original: nanu sādhyahīnaṃ nirdarśanam, buddhyādiśūnyatvena ghaṭādeḥ pratyakṣato 'dhigantum aśakyatvād anumānenaivādhigame cānavasthāprasaṅgād iti, na; ghaṭādyāśrayatve taddarśibhir bahubhir buddhyāder grahaṇaṃ prasajyeta, bāhyendriyagrahaṇaprasaṅgāc ca. na hi bhūtāśrayiṇāṃ guṇānāṃ niyataikapuruṣagrāhyatvam antaḥkaraṇaikagrāhyatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭam. kiṃ ca yāvad āśrayopalambhaprasaṅgād rūpādivan na hi bhūtakāryaviśeṣāṇām āśraye saty apy atyantocchedo dṛśyate. lāvaṇyādivad iti cet, na; lāvaṇyādīnāṃ rūpasaṃyogasparśānām anyatamasvabhāvatvāt. na ca rūpādimātraṃ mṛtaśarīre 'py atyantam ucchidyate.
analyzed: nanu sādhya hīnam nirdarśanam buddhi ādi śūnyatvena ghaṭa ādeḥ pratyakṣataḥ dhigantum aśakya tvāt anumānena eva adhigame ca anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti na ghaṭa ādi āśraya tve tad darśibhiḥ bahubhiḥ buddhi ādeḥ grahaṇam prasajyeta bāhya indriya grahaṇa prasaṅgāt ca na hi bhūta āśrayiṇām guṇānām niyata eka puruṣa grāhya tvam antaḥkaraṇa eka grāhya tvam ca dṛṣṭam kim ca yāvat āśraya upalambha prasaṅgāt rūpa ādi vat na hi bhūta kārya vi

original: kiṃ ca jīvaccharīravad aghaṭādāv api buddhyādisūcakasya pravṛttyāder upalambhaprasaṅgāt, dvayor buddhyādyāśrayatvāviśeṣāt. jīvaccharīreṣv eva pravṛttyādijananasamarthaṃ buddhyādi, na ghaṭādau. tena tatra saty api buddhyādau tatsūcakasya pravṛttyāder anupalambha iti cet, na; tadanupalambhe buddhyādimātrasyāpi sattve pramāṇābhāvāt. asattve 'pi pramāṇaṃ nāstīti cet, na; tathāvidhasyāprasiddhatvāt. na hi yatra kadācid api pravṛttyādiliṅgaṃ nopalabhyate, tatra buddhyādiprasiddhir asti. tathā bhūtaṃ vāstu mā vā bhūt, yat tāvat prasiddhaṃ buddhyādi tasyābhāvas tāvad ghaṭādau niścitatalliṅgasya tatra pravṛttyādyanyatamasya kadācid apy anupalambhāt. tato na sādhyahīnaṃ nidarśanam iti.
analyzed: kim ca jīvat śarīra vat aghaṭa ādau api buddhi ādi sūcakasya pravṛtti ādeḥ upalambha prasaṅgāt dvayoḥ buddhi ādi āśraya tva aviśeṣāt jīvat śarīreṣu eva pravṛtti ādi janana samartham buddhi ādi na ghaṭa ādau tena tatra sati api buddhi ādau tad sūcakasya pravṛtti ādeḥ anupalambhaḥ iti ced na tad anupalambhe buddhi ādi mātrasya api sattve pramāṇa abhāvāt asattve pi pramāṇam na asti iti ced na tathāvidhasya aprasiddha tvāt na hi yatra kadācid api prav

original: etenendriyamanasāṃ karaṇatvena buddhyādyāśrayatvaṃ pratiṣiddham eva syāt. nidarśanasya sādhyahīnatvaṃ parihṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam. evaṃ ca śarīrendriyādiguṇatve pratiṣiddhe, pariśeṣādyatraite guṇā vartante, sa ātmeti gamyate.
analyzed: etena indriya manasām karaṇa tvena buddhi ādi āśraya tvam pratiṣiddham eva syāt nidarśanasya sādhya hīna tvam parihṛtam draṣṭavyam evam ca śarīra indriya ādi guṇa tve pratiṣiddhe pariśeṣāt yatra ete guṇāḥ vartante saḥ ātmā iti gamyate

original: {icchādīnāṃ kramaviśeṣād ātmāśritatvam eva}
analyzed: icchā ādīnām krama viśeṣāt ātma āśrita tvam eva

original: kiṃ ca yena krameṇecchādayo guṇā utpadyamānā dṛśyante, tena krameṇaiṣāṃ śarīrāśrayatve saty utpattir na syāt. tathā hi — yajjātīyasyārthasya sannikarṣāt sukham ātmopalabdhatvāt, tajjātīyam arthaṃ paśyan ādātum icchati, seyam ādātum icchā ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānād bhavantī liṅgam ātmatattvasya. na hy anyenānubhūte sukhahetāv anyasya pratisandhānād icchā bhavatīti.
analyzed: kim ca yena krameṇa icchā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ utpadyamānāḥ dṛśyante tena krameṇa eṣām śarīra āśraya tve satī utpattiḥ na syāt tathā hi yad jātīyasya arthasya sannikarṣāt sukham ātma upalabdha tvāt tad jātīyam artham paśyan ādātum icchati sā iyam ādātum icchā ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt bhavantī liṅgam ātma tattvasya na hi anyena anubhūte sukha hetau anyasya pratisandhānāt icchā bhavati iti

original: tathā yajjātīyasyārthasya sannipāte duḥkham anubhūtavān ātmā, tajjātīyam arthaṃ dṛṣṭvā dveṣṭi, so 'yaṃ dveṣa ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānād bhavan ātmaliṅgam. na hy anyathāsya darśanapratisandhānād utpādaḥ sambhavaty anyadṛṣṭe 'nyasya pratisandhānāsambhavāt. nāpy anyadīyād duḥkhahetudarśanapratisandhānād anyasya dveṣaḥ sambhavatīti.
analyzed: tathā yad jātīyasya arthasya sannipāte duḥkham anubhūtavān ātmā tad jātīyam artham dṛṣṭvā dveṣṭi saḥ yam dveṣaḥ ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt bhavan ātma liṅgam na hi anyathā asya darśana pratisandhānāt utpādaḥ sambhavati anya dṛṣṭe nyasya pratisandhāna asambhavāt na api anyadīyāt duḥkha hetu darśana pratisandhānāt anyasya dveṣaḥ sambhavati iti

original: yajjātīyasyārthasya sannipāte sukhahetuḥ duḥkhahetur vāvadhāritas tajjātīyam arthaṃ paśyann īpsan jihāsanvāptiparihārārthaṃ prayatate, so 'yaṃ prayatnaḥ ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānād bhavann ātmaliṅgam, pūrvoktān nyāyāt.
analyzed: yad jātīyasya arthasya sannipāte sukha hetuḥ duḥkha hetuḥ vā avadhāritaḥ tad jātīyam artham paśyan īpsan jihāsan vāpti parihāra artham prayatate saḥ yam prayatnaḥ ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt bhavan ātma liṅgam pūrva uktāt nyāyāt

original: yajjātīyasyārthasya sannidhāne sukham upalabdhavāṃs tajjātīye 'rthe pratisandhānād uktasya sukham utpadyate, tad idaṃ sukhadarśanapratisandhānajād rāgād utpannam ātmaliṅgam, niyataviṣaye hi buddhibhedamātre na syād dehāntaravat.
analyzed: yad jātīyasya arthasya sannidhāne sukham upalabdhavān tad jātīye rthe pratisandhānāt uktasya sukham utpadyate tat idam sukha darśana pratisandhāna jāt rāgāt utpannam ātma liṅgam niyata viṣaye hi buddhi bheda mātre na syāt deha antara vat

original: tathā yajjātīyārthasannipāte duḥkham upalabdhavāṃs tajjātīyam arthaṃ cireṇāpi dṛṣṭvā tatpratisandhānād dviṣato duḥkham utpadyate, tad idaṃ duḥkhaṃ teddhetudarśanapratisandhānabhāvino dveṣād utpannaṃ liṅgam ātmanaḥ, na hy anyathāpratisandhānādikramaḥ sambhavatīti.
analyzed: tathā yad jātīya artha sannipāte duḥkham upalabdhavān tad jātīyam artham cireṇa api dṛṣṭvā tad pratisandhānāt dviṣataḥ duḥkham utpadyate tat idam duḥkham tad id hetu darśana pratisandhāna bhāvinaḥ dveṣāt utpannam liṅgam ātmanaḥ na hi anyathā pratisandhāna ādi kramaḥ sambhavati iti

original: kiṃ cānyad ūrddhatvādidharmakam arthaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ vimṛśan bubhutsate, tato 'sya viśeṣadarśanān nirṇayajñānaṃ bhavati, tad idaṃ jñānaṃ vimarśabubhutsābhyāṃ sahaikakartṛkaṃ gṛhyamāṇam ātmano liṅgam iti. na hy adṛṣṭe 'nyadṛṣṭe vā smṛtiḥ pratisandhānaṃ ca bhavati, tadabhāve tadekakartṛkāṇām icchādīnām apy utpādo na syād iti.
analyzed: kim ca anyat ūrddha tva ādi dharmakam artham dṛṣṭvā tad viśeṣa apekṣāyām vimṛśan bubhutsate viśeṣa darśanāt nirṇaya jñānam bhavati tat idam jñānam vimarśa bubhutsābhyām saha eka kartṛkam gṛhyamāṇam ātmanaḥ liṅgam iti na hi adṛṣṭe nyadṛṣṭe vā smṛtiḥ pratisandhānam ca bhavati tad abhāve tad eka kartṛkāṇām icchā ādīnām api utpādaḥ na syāt iti

original: {idriyāṇāṃ caitanyābhāvopapādanam}

indriyāṇāṃ kartṛtve 'py ekakartṛkatvasambhavāt nātmasiddhir iti cet, na; indriyāṇāṃ nānātvād ekatvānupapattes tataś caikendriyaviṣayopalabdhāv indriyāntarviṣaye smṛtipratisandhānādikaṃ na syāt, dṛśyate ca tat; tasmān nendriyavṛttaya icchādaya iti.
analyzed: indriyāṇām kartṛ tve pi eka kartṛka tva sambhavāt na ātma siddhiḥ iti ced na indriyāṇām nānātvāt ekatva anupapatteḥ tatas ca eka indriya viṣaya upalabdhau indriya antar viṣaye smṛti pratisandhāna ādikam na syāt dṛśyate ca tat tasmāt na indriya vṛttayaḥ icchā ādayaḥ iti

original: kiṃ cendriyopaghāte 'pi tadviṣaye smṛtidarśanāt, na cānubhavitur upaghāte smṛtiḥ sambhavati, sādhāraṇavigrahaprasaṅgāt tataś ca bhinnābhiprāyeṇa pravṛtteḥ kadācid dehaḥ khaṇḍaśo bhavet.
analyzed: kim ca indriya upaghāte tad viṣaye smṛti darśanāt na ca anubhavituḥ upaghāte smṛtiḥ sambhavati sādhāraṇa vigraha prasaṅgāt tatas ca bhinna abhiprāyeṇa pravṛtteḥ kadācid dehaḥ khaṇḍaśas bhavet

original: kiṃ ca nānādeheṣu iva nānācetanānumāpikā sukhādivyavasthaikasminn api dehe gṛhyate, vipratipattiś ca syād ekagṛhāvasthitānekacetanānām iva kadācid vivādādayaś ca pravarteran. śiṣyācāryādisambandho 'pi kvacic charīre gṛhyeta.
analyzed: kim ca nānā deheṣu iva nānā cetanā anumāpikā sukha ādi vyavasthā ekasmin api dehe gṛhyate vipratipattiḥ ca syāt eka gṛha avasthita aneka cetanānām iva kadācid vivāda ādayaḥ ca pravarteran śiṣya ācārya ādi sambandhaḥ kvacid śarīre gṛhyeta

original: cetanānīndriyāṇi, vyavasthitaviṣayatvāt, sadgṛhasthavad iti cet, na; vyavasthitaviṣayatvād eva hi pradīpādivad acetanāni. na ca rūpādiṣu vyavasthitaviṣayaḥ kaścic cetano 'sti yo 'tra dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt.
analyzed: cetanāni indriyāṇi vyavasthita viṣaya tvāt sat gṛhastha vat iti ced na vyavasthita viṣaya tvāt eva hi pradīpa ādi vat acetanāni na ca rūpa ādiṣu vyavasthita viṣayaḥ kaścid dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt

original: {indriyāṇāṃ caitanye pravṛttinivṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ}
analyzed: indriyāṇām caitanye pravṛtti nivṛtti abhāva prasaṅgaḥ

original: pravṛttinivṛttyābhāvaprasaṅgaś ca — yasmād odanādau dṛṣṭe tadrasādyanumānāt puruṣaḥ pravartate, nivartate vā. taccānumānaṃ na cakṣuṣo, nāpi rasanādeḥ, sambhavati, rūparasādīnām anyonyādṛṣṭatvena tatsambandhasya kenacid apy agṛhītatvāt. svārthaparārthāsambhavāc ca — na svārthaṃ cakṣuḥ pravartate, svārthasya tenānanubhūtatvāt. rasādikaṃ ca pravartamānam apy anubhavituṃ na śaknoti. nāpi rasanādyarthaṃ pravartate, saha tadarthena rasanādisvarūpāparijñānāt. nāpi rasanāder eva pravṛttiḥ, tasya hi deśādyajñāne kva pravṛttiḥ syāt? tasmād eko rūparasādīnāṃ indriyavyatirikto 'nubhavitā smartā vāsti, yo rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā rasādikam anumāya pravartata iti.
analyzed: pravṛtti nivṛttyā abhāva prasaṅgaḥ ca yasmāt odana ādau dṛṣṭe tad rasa ādi anumānāt puruṣaḥ pravartate nivartate vā tat ca anumānam na cakṣuṣaḥ na api rasanā ādeḥ sambhavati rūpa rasa ādīnām anyonya adṛṣṭa tvena tad sambandhasya kenacid api agṛhīta tvāt svārtha parārtha asambhavāt ca na svārtham cakṣuḥ pravartate svārthasya tena ananubhūta tvāt rasa ādikam ca pravartamānam api anubhavitum na śaknoti na api rasanā ādi artham pravartate saha

original: {dehasyātmatvaśaṅkā tannirāsaś ca}
analyzed: dehasya ātma tva śaṅkā tad nirāsaḥ ca

original: deha eva tarhy astu, tathā coktam — "caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣaḥ" iti. ko 'yaṃ kāyaḥ? kim avayavāḥ? āhosvid avayavīti? yady avayavāḥ, tatas teṣāṃ bahutvād bhinnābhiprāyeṇa pravṛttyādayo doṣāḥ pūrvoktā bhaveyuḥ. khaṇḍakhaṇḍīkṛtānāṃ cāvayavānāṃ jñānādayaḥ svaliṅgair upalabhyeran, rūpādivat. na hi rūparasādayaḥ khaṇḍakhaṇḍīkṛtānām avayavānāṃ nopalabhyanta iti.
analyzed: dehaḥ eva tarhi astu tathā ca uktam caitanya viśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣaḥ iti kaḥ yam kāyaḥ kim avayavāḥ āhosvit avayavi iti yadi avayavāḥ tatas teṣām bahutvāt bhinna abhiprāyeṇa pravṛtti ādayaḥ doṣāḥ pūrva uktāḥ bhaveyuḥ khaṇḍa khaṇḍīkṛtānām ca avayavānām jñāna ādayaḥ sva liṅgaiḥ upalabhyeran rūpa ādi vat na hi rūpa rasa ādayaḥ khaṇḍa khaṇḍīkṛtānām avayavānām na upalabhyante iti

original: {avayavasaṅghātasya caitanyaniṣedhaḥ}

atha tatsaṅghātaḥ kāya uktaḥ, sa kim avyatiriktaḥ? vyatirikto vā? yady avyatiriktaḥ, tadāvayavā eva nāmāntareṇoktāḥ, tatra coktaṃ doṣajātam. kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭā avayavāḥ saṅghātaḥ — ity atrāpi cetanabahutvādidoṣānivṛttiḥ. atha vyatiriktaḥ saṅghātaḥ, sa sanniveśarūpaḥ? avayavī vā syāt? ubhayathāpi pratidinaṃ vināśatvāt kālāntarānubhūteṣv artheṣu smṛtipratisandhānādyanupapattiḥ. saṃyogaviśeṣo hi saṃyogasya niveśesañcayasaṃsthānādiśabdair abhidhīyate, tasya ca pratimuhūrtaṃ vināśo 'nyathā hy annapānopabhogānupabhogābhyāṃ dehasya puṣṭidaurbalyādayo na syuḥ. saṃyogavināśāc cāvayavino 'pi vināśaḥ.
analyzed: atha tad saṅghātaḥ kāyaḥ uktaḥ sa kim avyatiriktaḥ vyatiriktaḥ vā yadi avyatiriktaḥ tadā avayavāḥ eva nāma antareṇa uktāḥ tatra ca uktam doṣa jātam kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭāḥ avayavāḥ saṅghātaḥ iti atra api cetana bahu tva ādi doṣa anivṛttiḥ atha vyatiriktaḥ saṅghātaḥ sa sanniveśa rūpaḥ avayavī vā syāt ubhayathā api pratidinam vināśa tvāt kāla antara anubhūteṣu artheṣu smṛti pratisandhāna ādi anupapattiḥ saṃyoga viśeṣa

original: {kṣaṇabhaṅgurasya dehasya santānaḥ}
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅgurasya dehasya santānaḥ

original: kiṃ ca yat pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ hetum āśrityāvatiṣṭhate, tatsadṛśaparāparotpattiḥ santānenaivāvatiṣṭhate, yathā tailam āśritya pradīpaḥ, tathā cāhāram āśritya dehas tiṣṭhati. tasmāt pratikṣaṇavināśī santānenotpadyamānaḥ pradīpavad upalabhyate, pratyabhijñāyate ceti.
analyzed: kim ca yat pratikṣaṇam kṣīyamāṇam hetum āśritya avatiṣṭhate tad sadṛśa para apara utpattiḥ santānena eva avatiṣṭhate yathā tailam āśritya pradīpaḥ tathā ca āhāram āśritya dehaḥ tiṣṭhati tasmāt prati kṣaṇa vināśī santānena utpadyamānaḥ pradīpa vat upalabhyate pratyabhijñāyate ca iti

original: {avasthābhedād dehasyāpi bhedaḥ}
analyzed: avasthā bhedāt dehasya api bhedaḥ

original: tathā ca yat kaiścid uktam — "bālakaumārādyavasthā eva bhidyante na tv avasthāvān iti", tan nirastam, evaṃ hi pradīpāder api vināśasiddhir na syāt, tatrāpy avasthā eva bhidyanta iti pādaprasārikopapatteḥ.
analyzed: tathā ca yat kaiścid uktam bāla kaumāra ādi avasthāḥ eva bhidyante na tu avasthāvān iti tat nirastam evam hi pradīpa ādeḥ api vināśa siddhiḥ na syāt tatra api avasthāḥ eva bhidyante iti pādaprasārikā upapatteḥ

original: satkāryasiddhiś ca prasajyate — mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭakapālādyavasthā eva vyaktāvyaktasthūlasūkṣmadṛśyādṛśyādyavasthā eva bhidyante. tathā ca pradhānabrahmadvaitādisiddhiḥ — ekasyaiva hi pṛthivyudakajyotiranilādyavasthā eveti. avasthāś cāvasthāvato 'nyatvānanyatvābhyām anirvacanīyāḥ — ity evaṃ pādau prasārya tiṣṭhann advaitavādī sāṃkhyaś ca kathaṃ pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate? tasmād bhedavādabhicchadbhiviruddhadharmādhyāsād bhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ. sa ca dehe 'sti, bālakaumārādidharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmabhedasya ca viruddhatvād iti. tad evaṃ dehasyāpy anavasthitvān na smṛtipratisandhānādyāśrayatvaṃ sambhavati.
analyzed: satkārya siddhiḥ ca prasajyate mṛd piṇḍa ghaṭa kapāla ādi avasthāḥ eva vyakta avyakta sthūla sūkṣma dṛśya adṛśya ādi avasthāḥ eva bhidyante tathā ca pradhāna brahma dvaita ādi siddhiḥ ekasya eva hi pṛthivī udaka jyotiḥ anila ādi avasthāḥ eva iti avasthāḥ ca avasthāvataḥ nya tva ananya tvābhyām anirvacanīyāḥ iti evam pādau prasārya tiṣṭhan advaita vādī sāṃkhyaḥ ca katham pratyākhyātum śakyate tasmāt bheda vādabhicchadbhi viruddha dhar

original: {śarīrasantāne kāryakāraṇabhāvānupapattiḥ}
analyzed: śarīra santāne kārya kāraṇa bhāva anupapattiḥ

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvād uttaradehasya pūrvadehānubhūte 'rthe smṛtyādyutpattir iti cet, kiṃ punaḥ pūrvadeha uttaradehaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇam? utāsamavāyikāraṇam? āhosvin nimittakāraṇam iti? kiṃ cātaḥ? samavāyikakāraṇatve, vṛddhaśarīrakāle 'pi tadāśrayatvena pūrvaśarīrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ, samavāyikāraṇasya kāryeṇa virodhābhāvāt. na ca samavāyikāraṇanivṛttau kāryasyāvasthānaṃ kvacid asti.
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt uttara dehasya pūrva deha anubhūte rthe smṛti ādi utpattiḥ iti ced kim punar pūrva dehaḥ uttara deham prati samavāyi kāraṇam uta asamavāyi kāraṇam āhosvit nimitta kāraṇam iti kim ca atas samavāyika kāraṇa tve vṛddha śarīra kāle tad āśraya tvena pūrva śarīrāṇām sarveṣām grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ samavāyi kāraṇasya kāryeṇa virodha abhāvāt na ca samavāyi kāraṇa nivṛttau kāryasya avasthānam kvacid asti

original: kiṃ ca dvayor bahūnāṃ vā dravyāṇāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikaraṇatvaṃ na tv ekasya, na hy ekadravyāśritaṃ dravyaṃ kvacid upalabhyata iti. kiṃ cātaḥ? samavāyikāraṇatvaṃ dravyasyāsamavāyikaraṇatvāsambhāvāt. kāryānādhāratve saty anyatarayā pratyāsattyā pratyāsannaṃ yat kāraṇam, tad asamavāyikāraṇam ucyate.
analyzed: kim ca dvayoḥ bahūnām vā dravyāṇām dravyam prati samavāyi karaṇa tvam na tu ekasya na hi eka dravya āśritam dravyam kvacid upalabhyate iti kim ca atas samavāyi kāraṇa tvam dravyasya asamavāyi karaṇa tva asambhāvāt kārya anādhāra tve sati anyatarayā pratyāsattyā pratyāsannam yat kāraṇam tat asamavāyi kāraṇam ucyate

original: {asamavāyikāraṇapratyāsattiḥ}
pratyāsattis tu — kāryakāraṇaikārthasamavāyilakṣaṇā. yathā — avayavarūpādīnām avayavirūpādibhiḥ saha kāryaikārthasamavāyilakṣaṇā ca laghvī, yathāntaḥkaraṇasaṃyogāder buddhyādibhiḥ saheti.
analyzed: pratyāsattiḥ tu kārya kāraṇa ekārtha samavāyi lakṣaṇā yathā avayava rūpa ādīnām avayavi rūpa ādibhiḥ saha kārya ekārtha samavāyi lakṣaṇā ca laghvī yathā antaḥkaraṇa saṃyoga ādeḥ buddhi ādibhiḥ saha iti

original: {icchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇatvasthāpanam}
analyzed: icchā ādīnām samavāyi kāraṇa tva sthāpanam

original: evaṃ cecchādīnāṃ prayatnādyārambhe nimittakāraṇatvam ayuktam, asamavāyikāraṇalakṣaṇopapatteḥ. avadhṛtasāmarthyatvābhāvān neti cet, sāmarthyānavadhāraṇe tarhi kāraṇatvam eva nāsti.
analyzed: evam ca icchā ādīnām prayatna ādi ārambhe nimitta kāraṇa tvam ayuktam asamavāyi kāraṇa lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ avadhṛta sāmarthya tva abhāvāt na iti ced sāmarthya anavadhāraṇe tarhi kāraṇa tvam eva na asti

original: athāntaḥkaraṇasya yathā sarvātmaviśeṣaguṇotpattau sāmarthyam, na tathecchādīnām, tena teṣām asamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ neṣṭam, manaḥ saṃyogasyaiva samarthatvād iti, na; adṛṣṭābhāve manaḥsaṃyogasya sāmarthyānavadhāraṇāt. adṛṣṭasyāpi vā asamavāyikāraṇatvam astu.
analyzed: atha antaḥkaraṇasya yathā sarva ātma viśeṣa guṇa utpattau sāmarthyam na tathā icchā ādīnām tena teṣām asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam na iṣṭam manaḥ saṃyogasya eva samartha tvāt iti na adṛṣṭa abhāve manaḥ saṃyogasya sāmarthya anavadhāraṇāt adṛṣṭasya api vā asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam astu

original: kiṃ ca gurutvadravatvādīnāṃ karmotpattāv asamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ nābhyupagantavyam, mūrter eva samarthatvāt. na hi mūrtyabhāve kvacit kriyā bhavati, tasyā ubhayor atha samavāyikāraṇatvam. na cāyaṃ niyamo 'sty ekasyaiva vā samavāyikāraṇatvam ity āstāṃ tāvad ayaṃ vicāraḥ.
analyzed: kim ca guru tva drava tva ādīnām karma utpattau asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam na abhyupagantavyam mūrteḥ eva samartha tvāt na hi mūrti abhāve kvacid kriyā bhavati tasyāḥ ubhayoḥ atha samavāyi kāraṇa tvam na ca ayam niyamaḥ u sti ekasya eva vā samavāyi kāraṇa tvam iti āstām tāvat ayam vicāraḥ

original: tan na deho 'samavāyikāraṇam, nimittakāraṇatve tu na smaraṇādyupapattiḥ. pitṛprapitāmahādyanubhūtārtheṣv api smaraṇādiprasaṅgāt.
analyzed: tat na samavāyi kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇa tve tu na smaraṇa ādi upapattiḥ pitṛ prapitāmaha ādi anubhūta artheṣu api smaraṇa ādi prasaṅgāt

original: {dehāvayavasaṃskārasantānaśaṅkā}
analyzed: deha avayava saṃskāra santāna śaṅkā

original: syād etat — nāsmākaṃ bauddhānām iva niranvayo vināśaḥ, kin tv avayavivināśānantaram avasthitasaṃyogair avayavair anyad dravyāntaram ārabhyate. tatra yathā pūrvadehāśritarūpādivināśe 'pi tatsadṛśa eva rūpādayas tadavayavarūpādibhir ārabhyante, tathā pūrvadehasaṃskāranivṛttāv api tatsadṛśa eva saṃskāras tadavayavasaṃskārair ārabhyate, tataḥ pūrvadehānubhūteṣv api artheṣūttaradehe smaraṇādyupapattir iti.
analyzed: syāt etat na asmākam bauddhānām iva niranvayaḥ vināśaḥ kin tu avayavi vināśa anantaram avasthita saṃyogaiḥ avayavaiḥ anyat dravya antaram ārabhyate tatra yathā pūrva deha āśrita rūpa ādi vināśe tad sadṛśaḥ eva rūpa ādayaḥ tad avayava rūpa ādibhiḥ ārabhyante tathā pūrva deha saṃskāra nivṛttau api tad sadṛśaḥ eva saṃskāraḥ tad avayava saṃskāraiḥ ārabhyate tatas pūrva deha anubhūteṣu api artheṣu uttara dehe smaraṇa ādi upapattiḥ iti

original: {tannirāsaḥ}

naitad asti, rūpādīnāṃ hi sarvatra kāryadravye kāraṇaguṇapūrvakaḥ prādurbhāvas tena yāvatparamāṇuṣu guṇāntaraprādurbhāvo na bhavati, tāvad yo 'vayavī, taiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ pāramparyeṇāpy ārabhyate, tatra tatra tatsadṛśā eva rūpadaya utpadyanta iti yuktam. na tv evaṃ paramāṇuṣu saṃskārāḥ santi, ananubhavitṛtvāt. anubhavitṛtve tu cetanabahutvādayo doṣā uktāḥ. śarīrasya cānubhavitṛtve, tasyaiva saṃskāro 'stu, na, tadavayavānāṃ tato 'nyatvāt.
analyzed: na etat asti rūpa ādīnām hi sarvatra kārya dravye kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ tena yāvat paramāṇuṣu guṇa antara prādurbhāvaḥ na bhavati tāvat yaḥ vayavī taiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ pāramparyeṇa api ārabhyate tatra tatra tad sadṛśāḥ eva rūpa dayaḥ utpadyante iti yuktam na tu evam paramāṇuṣu saṃskārāḥ santi ananubhavitṛ tvāt anubhavitṛ tve tu cetana bahu tva ādayaḥ doṣāḥ uktāḥ śarīrasya ca anubhavitṛ tve tasya eva saṃskāraḥ

original: kiṃ ca māṃsāśināṃ śarīraṃ śaśamahiṣavarāhādiśarīrāvayavair apy ārabhyate. tatas tadānubhavasaṃskārāṇām api utpattau tadanubhūtārtheṣv api smṛtyādiprasaṅgaḥ syāt. atha vā śaśamahiṣādidehāvayavānāṃ carvaṇādyabhighātād āparamāṇvanto vināśaḥ, tena saṃskāro nānuvartata iti. evaṃ tarhi bālādiśarīrāvayavānām apy āparamāṇvanto vināśaḥ sarvatra saṃcaradbhir vāyvagnirasādibhiḥ kriyate, tatas tatsaṃskārānuvṛttir apy ayuktā. avināśe vā bālādidehāvayavānām aṅgulyādīnāṃ tathābhūtānām eva sarvadaiva grahaṇaṃ syāt, pathyauṣadhādikṛtaviśeṣopalabdhiś ca na syād iti. tasmāc charīrasyāpi pratikṣaṇavināśitvāt necchādyāśrayatvaṃ yuktam.
analyzed: kim ca māṃsa āśinām śarīram śaśa mahiṣa varāha ādi śarīra avayavaiḥ api ārabhyate tatas tadā anubhava saṃskārāṇām api utpattau tad anubhūta artheṣu api smṛti ādi prasaṅgaḥ syāt atha vā śaśa mahiṣa ādi deha avayavānām carvaṇa ādi abhighātāt ā paramāṇu antar vināśaḥ tena saṃskāraḥ na anuvartate iti evam tarhi bāla ādi śarīra avayavānām api ā paramāṇu antar vināśaḥ sarvatra saṃcaradbhiḥ vāyu agni rasa ādibhiḥ kriyate tatas t

original: kiṃ ca pūrvābhyastasmṛtyanubandhād ityādinānādir icchādīnām āśraya iti vakṣyāmaḥ. tan na deha indriyāṇi vā prāṇādir vā viṣayo vecchādīnām āśrayaḥ sambhavati, dehavad indriyādīnām apy anāditvāsambhavād iti.
analyzed: kim ca pūrva abhyasta smṛti anubandhāt ityādinā anādiḥ icchā ādīnām āśrayaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ tat na dehaḥ indriyāṇi vā prāṇa ādiḥ vā viṣayaḥ vā icchā ādīnām āśrayaḥ sambhavati deha vat indriya ādīnām api anādi tva asambhavāt iti

original: {manaso 'pi necchādyāśrayatvam}
analyzed: manasaḥ api na icchā ādi āśraya tvam

original: manasas tarhi nityatvād icchādyāśrayatvam astu, na; tasyāpi karaṇatvād vāsyāsyādivat. asiddhim iti cet, na; tatsattvagrāhakapramāṇair eva karaṇatvasiddheḥ. kiṃ cecchādyādhārasya vibhutvapratipādanāt, manasas tu yugapajjānānupapattyāṇutvaṃ prasādhitam. manasaḥ khalu vibhutvecchādhāratvābhyupagame, saṃjñāmātre vivāda iti.
analyzed: manasaḥ tarhi nitya tvāt icchā ādi āśraya tvam astu na tasya api karaṇa tvāt asiddhim iti ced na tad sattva grāhaka pramāṇaiḥ eva karaṇa tva siddheḥ kim ca icchā ādi ādhārasya vibhu tva pratipādanāt manasaḥ tu yugapad jāna anupapattyā aṇu tvam prasādhitam manasaḥ khalu vibhu tva icchā ādhāra tva abhyupagame saṃjñā mātre vivādaḥ iti

original: {jñānasya vāsanāśrayatvānupapattiḥ}
analyzed: jñānasya vāsanā āśraya tva anupapattiḥ

original: jñānam eva vāsanābhir vāsitaṃ mana ity ucyate, tadāśraya evecchādya iti cet, na; asthiratvena jñānasya vāsanādyāśrayatvānupapatteḥ. sthiraṃ hi vāsakena vāsyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam. sambaddhaṃ ca yathā — puṣpādinā vastrādikam. āśrayatvam api sthirasya sambaddhasya ca dṛṣṭam, yathā — kuḍyāder iti. na ca jñānasya sthairyam asti, jñānāntareṇecchādinā vā vinaṣṭatvāt. tasmān na jñānaṃ kenacid vāsitam, nāpi kasyacid āśraya iti.
analyzed: jñānam eva vāsanābhiḥ vāsitam manaḥ iti ucyate tad āśrayaḥ eva icchā ādyaḥ iti ced na asthira tvena jñānasya vāsanā ādi āśraya tva anupapatteḥ sthiram hi vāsakena vāsyamānam dṛṣṭam sambaddham ca yathā puṣpa ādinā vastra ādikam āśraya tvam api sthirasya sambaddhasya ca dṛṣṭam yathā kuḍya ādeḥ iti na ca jñānasya sthairyam asti jñāna antareṇa icchā ādinā vā vinaṣṭa tvāt tasmāt na jñānam kenacid vāsitam na api kasyacid āśrayaḥ iti

original: {kṣaṇikavāde vāsyavāsakabhāvānupapattiḥ}
analyzed: kṣaṇika vāde vāsya vāsaka bhāva anupapattiḥ

original: nanv idam asiddhaṃ nidarśanaṃ na hi kṣaṇikavādināṃ sthiraṃ kiṃcid asti. nāpi sambandhaḥ kasyacit. vastrāder api hi vāsanā puṣpādisahitāt pūrvakṣaṇād viśiṣṭotpāda eva. āśrayabhāvas tu kuḍyāder api. janakatvaviśeṣa eveti. na, atrāpi dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt. na hy akṣaṇikavādināṃ kiṃcid asambaddhaṃ bhinnakālaṃ ca vāsyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam, nāpi bhinnakālasyāsambaddhasya ca kasyacid āśrayatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti.
analyzed: nanu idam asiddham nidarśanam na hi kṣaṇika vādinām sthiram kiṃcid asti nā api sambandhaḥ kasyacid vastra ādeḥ api hi vāsanā puṣpa ādi sahitāt pūrva kṣaṇāt viśiṣṭa utpādaḥ eva āśraya bhāvaḥ tu kuḍya ādeḥ api janaka tva viśeṣaḥ eva iti na atra api dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt na hi akṣaṇika vādinām kiṃcid asambaddham bhinna kālam ca vāsyamānam dṛṣṭam nā api bhinna kālasya asambaddhasya ca kasyacid āśraya tvam dṛṣṭam iti

original: tathā hi — na tāvad aneko 'rthaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti ekasvabhāvatvāt. sa hy ekasvabhāvo yāvatāṃ kāryāṇām utpādane samarthas, tāvanti sakṛd eva kuryāt, samarthasya kṣepāyogāt. kṣepe vā prathamakāryotpādako 'pi na syāt. prathamakāryotpādanakāle tasyāgamikāryotpattāv asāmarthyam iti cet, evaṃ tarhi na tataḥ kadācid āgāmikāryotpattiḥ, tadaśaktasvarūpāparityāgāt. parityāge vā na pūrvottarakriyāhetor ekatvaṃ tadbhede ca prāptaṃ kṣaṇikatvam. nāpi yugapad eva karoti, tathā nirvartanasvabhāvasyāparibhraṃśāt. satatam evārthakriyāyaugapadyaṃ kuryāt tatsvabhāvanivṛttau voktaṃ kṣaṇikatvam iti. nāpi sahakārikramam apekṣya krameṇaikaḥ kāryaṃ karoti, anupakārivyapekṣāyogāt tad uktam —
analyzed: tathā hi na tāvat anekaḥ rthaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti eka svabhāva tvāt sa hi eka svabhāvaḥ yāvatām kāryāṇām utpādane samarthaḥ tāvanti sakṛt eva kuryāt samarthasya kṣepa ayogāt kṣepe vā na syāt prathama kārya utpādana kāle tasya āgami kārya utpattau asāmarthyam iti ced evam tarhi na tatas kadācid āgāmi kārya utpattiḥ tad aśakta svarūpa aparityāgāt parityāge vā na pūrva uttara kriyā hetoḥ ekatvam tad bhede ca prāptam kṣaṇikatvam nā api yad a

original: apekṣyeta paraḥ kāryaṃ yadi vidyeta kiṃcana /
analyzed: apekṣyeta paraḥ kāryam yadi vidyeta kiṃcana

original: yadi kiṃcitkaraṃ vāstu kiṃ kenacid apekṣyate // (PV 3.579)
analyzed: yadi kiṃcitkaram vāstu kim kenacid apekṣyate

original: {vyatiriktāvyatirikopakārāsambhavaḥ}

anupakāritvaṃ ca vyatiriktāvyatiriktopakārāsambhavāt — yadi hetor avyatiriktaḥ sahakāribhir upakāraḥ kriyate, tadā sa eva kriyata ity āpadyate, tathā ca vyarthāḥ sahakāriṇas tadrūpasya prāg eva siddhatvāt. vyatiriktaś ced upakāraḥ, sa tasyeti kaḥ sambandhaḥ? tādātmyapakṣe na vyatirekaḥ. tadutpattipakṣe 'pi yadi sahakārinirapekṣāt tata utpattiḥ, tadā kathaṃ na vyarthāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ? tadapekṣitve vā punas tataḥ upakāra eṣṭavyas tataḥ pūrvavad vyatiriktāvyatiriktapakṣayoḥ prasaṅgas tato 'navasthā syāt. tasmān na sahakāriṣv apekṣaṇaṃ yuktam.
analyzed: anupakāri tvam ca vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra asambhavāt yadi hetoḥ avyatiriktaḥ sahakāribhiḥ upakāraḥ kriyate tadā saḥ eva kriyate iti āpadyate tathā ca vyarthāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ tad rūpasya prāk eva siddha tvāt vyatiriktaḥ ced upakāraḥ sa tasya iti kaḥ sambandhaḥ tādātmya pakṣe na vyatirekaḥ tad utpatti pakṣe yadi sahakāri nirapekṣāt tatas utpattiḥ tadā katham na vyarthāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ tad apekṣi tve vā punar tatas upakāraḥ eṣṭavyaḥ tat

original: {śaktāśaktavikalpāsambhavaḥ}
analyzed: śakta aśakta vikalpa asambhavaḥ

original: śaktāśaktavikalpāsambhavāc ca — yadi śakto hetus tataḥ svayaṃ śaktatvād eva kāryaṃ karoti, na sahakāribhiḥ kiṃcit. aśaktaś ca sahakārisadbhāve 'pi na karoti, pāṣāṇa iva tailaṃ sahakāriṣu satsu śakto bhavatīti cet, evaṃ tarhi aśaktasvabhāvanivṛttau sahakāritaḥ śaktaṃ rūpam utpannam ity āpannam, tathā cānityatvam iti. tad evaṃ krameṇotpadyamāna eva hetuḥ krameṇa kāryakārī bījādivan na tv eko 'kramaḥ kramakārī kaścid astīti.
analyzed: śakta aśakta vikalpa asambhavāt ca yadi śaktaḥ hetuḥ tatas svayam śakta tvāt eva kāryam karoti na sahakāribhiḥ kiṃcid aśaktaḥ ca sahakāri sadbhāve pi na karoti pāṣāṇaḥ iva tailam sahakāriṣu satsu śaktaḥ bhavati iti ced evam tarhi aśakta svabhāva nivṛttau sahakāritaḥ śaktam rūpam utpannam iti āpannam tathā ca anitya tvam iti tat evam krameṇa utpadyamānaḥ eva hetuḥ krameṇa kārya kārī bīja ādi vat na tu ekaḥ kramaḥ krama kārī kaścid asti iti

original: {kṣaṇikatve 'numānaprayogaḥ}
analyzed: kṣaṇika tve numāna prayogaḥ

original: prayogo 'py atra — yad akṣaṇikam, tat san na bhavati. yathā śaśaviṣāṇādi. sac ca sarvam, tasmāt kṣaṇikam iti. sattvasyākṣaṇikāt vyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāyogād iti bādhakam uktam. śaktiḥ khalu bhāvalakṣaṇam, sarvaśaktivirahas tv abhāvalakṣaṇam. (HB 19,10–11) tac ca śaktilakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ kramākramakāryotpādena vyāptam. tena tathotpādo 'kṣaṇikān nirvartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ gṛhītvā nivartate, tasmān na sato 'kṣaṇikatvam iti.
analyzed: prayogaḥ api atra yat akṣaṇikam tat sat na bhavati yathā śaśaviṣāṇa ādi sat ca sarvam tasmāt kṣaṇikam iti sattvasya akṣaṇikāt vyatireka siddhi artham krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā yogāt iti bādhakam uktam śaktiḥ khalu bhāva lakṣaṇam sarva śakti virahaḥ tu abhāva lakṣaṇam tat ca śakti lakṣaṇam sattvam kramākrama kārya utpādena vyāptam tena tathā utpādaḥ kṣaṇikāt nirvartamānaḥ sva vyāpyam sattvam gṛhītvā nivartate tasmāt na sataḥ

original: {kṣaṇikavādanirāsaḥ}

atra pratividhīyate — yadi tāvad akṣaṇikānām asattvaṃ prasādhayitum abhipretam, tadā kasyātra dharmitvam? tasyaiva dharmitve, tasyaivāsattvāsādhanam ayuktam. na hy asati dharmiṇi hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvam, na cāsati pakṣadharmatve gamakatvam. tasmād asanto 'kṣaṇikā ity uktā pratijñā. atha santo 'rthā akṣaṇikā na bhavantīti pratijñārthaḥ, tathāpi tasyāṃ kramākramavirodhād ity asya kathaṃ pakṣadharmatvam? atha sattvam eva hetuḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sādhayad akṣaṇikatvābhāvaṃ sādhayatīti, tathāpi nānvayo na vyatireka ity asādhāraṇaḥ kathaṃ hetuḥ, pratipakṣe 'pi samānatvāt. pradīpādāv asty anvaya iti cet, na; asiddhatvāt — na hi pradīpāder api kṣaṇikatvaṃ siddham; jātasya nāśahetupratīkṣaṇād iti vakṣyāmaḥ. vyatirekabalenaivāsya gamakatvam iti cet, na; vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasyāpy abhāvāt. śaśaviṣāṇādir eva dṛṣṭānta iti cet, na; tasya pratipattyaviṣayatvāt — na hi svarūpeṇāpi yan na pradīyate, tat sādhyasādhanadharmarahitaṃ pratipattuṃ śakyate, na cāpratipannasya dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yuktam. śabdāt tatpratipattir asty eveti cet, sā kiṃ pramāṇam? apramāṇaṃ vā? pramāṇaṃ cet, na; tādātmyatadutpattipratibandhābhāvāt. pratibandhe hi vastutvaprasaṅgas tato 'kṣaṇikam api vastv astīti. pratibandhābhāve 'pi pramāṇatvābhyupagame "nāntarīyakatābhāvāt" ityādivirodhaḥ?
analyzed: atra pratividhīyate yadi tāvat akṣaṇikānām asattvam prasādhayitum abhipretam tadā kasya atra dharmi tvam tasya eva dharmi tve tasya eva asattva asādhanam ayuktam na hi asati dharmiṇi hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam na ca asati pakṣa dharma tve gamaka tvam tasmāt asantaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ iti uktā pratijñā atha santaḥ rthāḥ akṣaṇikāḥ na bhavanti iti pratijñā arthaḥ tathā api tasyām kramākrama virodhāt iti asya katham pakṣa dharma tvam atha sattvam eva hetuḥ kṣaṇika

original: athāpramāṇam, tataḥ katham adṛṣṭo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sidhyati? apramāṇapratīteḥ pratidṛṣṭānte 'pi sambhavān na vyatirekadṛṣṭāntasyāpi siddhiḥ.
analyzed: atha apramāṇam tatas katham adṛṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sidhyati apramāṇa pratīteḥ pratidṛṣṭānte sambhavāt na vyatireka dṛṣṭāntasya api siddhiḥ

original: {kramākramavirodhāt kṣaṇikatvāśaṃkā}
analyzed: kramākrama virodhāt kṣaṇika tva āśaṃkā

original: syād etat — pakṣa eva bādhakasāmarthyād anvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ. tathā hi — kṣaṇikasyārthakriyāyāṃ kramākramavirodhata ity uktam. tenārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sattvam akṣaṇikād vyāvṛttaṃ kṣaṇike 'rthakriyāvirodhābhāvād anvitam iti.
analyzed: syāt etat pakṣe eva bādhaka sāmarthyāt anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ tathā hi kṣaṇikasya arthakriyāyām kramākrama virodhataḥ iti uktam tena arthakriyā lakṣaṇam sattvam akṣaṇikāt vyāvṛttam kṣaṇike rthakriyā virodha abhāvāt anvitam iti

original: {tannirāsaḥ}

tad ayuktam, virodhyapratītau virodhasya pratyetum aśakyatvāt. na hi dahanatuhinayor anyatarāpratītau virodhapratītir asti. kramākramavirodhi cākṣaṇikaṃ yadi pratīyate, tataḥ katham asat, pratipattirūpārthakriyākāritvāt? atatkāritve ca kathaṃ pratīyate? na hi tvayārthāntaram ajanakaṃ pratītiviṣayatveneṣṭam. athākṣaṇikaṃ naiva pratīyate, tataḥ kathaṃ tasya kramākramābhyāṃ virodho 'vagamyate? na hi tayoḥ svarūpeṇaiva virodhaḥ, svarūpeṇa virodhe hi sarvasya pralayaprasaṅgāt.
analyzed: tat ayuktam virodhya pratītau virodhasya pratyetum aśakya tvāt na hi dahana tuhinayoḥ anyatara apratītau virodha pratītiḥ asti kramākrama virodhi ca akṣaṇikam yadi pratīyate tatas katham asat pratipatti rūpa artha kriyā kāri tvāt atatkāri tve ca katham pratīyate na hi tvayā arthāntaram ajanakam pratīti viṣaya tvena iṣṭam atha akṣaṇikam na eva pratīyate tatas katham tasya kramākramābhyām virodhaḥ vagamyate na hi tayoḥ sva rūpeṇa eva virodhaḥ sva rūpeṇa virod

original: {saṃvṛtikākṣānikenāpi virodhābhāvaḥ}
analyzed: saṃvṛtika ākṣānikena api virodha abhāvaḥ

original: saṃvṛttisiddhenākṣaṇikena virodhasiddhir iti cet, saṃvṛttisiddham api vāstavam kālpanikaṃ vā syāt. yadi vāstavam, tataḥ kathaṃ tasyāsattvam? kathaṃ vārthakriyāvirodhaḥ? arthakriyāṃ kurvad dhi vāstavam ucyate. atha kālpanikam, tadvirodhaḥ kiṃ vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā? na tāvad vāstavaḥ, kalpitavirodhivirodhatvāt, vandhyāputravirodhavat. atha virodho 'pi kālpanika eva, na tarhi paramārthato 'kṣaṇikasyārthakriyāyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ virodha ity ato 'kṣaṇikāt sattvasya vyatirekasiddhir apy apāramārthikīty avāstavavyatirekatvāt sattāyāḥ, tadāyattaṃ kṣaṇikatvam apy avāstavam eveti. tathā caitad aśakyam iva cchidrapidhānāyāsabahulaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādavyasanam ekaprahāreṇa nihatam.
analyzed: saṃvṛtti siddhena akṣaṇikena virodha siddhiḥ iti ced saṃvṛtti siddham api vāstavam kālpanikam vā syāt yadi vāstavam tatas katham tasya asattvam katham vā arthakriyā virodhaḥ arthakriyām kurvat dhi vāstavam ucyate atha kālpanikam tad virodhaḥ kim vāstavaḥ kālpanikaḥ vā na tāvat vāstavaḥ kalpita virodhi virodha tvāt vandhyā putra virodha vat atha virodhaḥ pi kālpanikaḥ eva na tarhi paramārthataḥ kṣaṇikasya arthakriyāyām krama akramābhyām virodhaḥ iti

original: {akramāt kramiṇām abhāvasādhanaṃ tannirāsaś ca}

syād etat — bījādikāraṇakramād aṅkurādikāryakramasyopalambhād eva na kramāt kramiṇāṃ bhāva iti vyatireko 'pi sidhyatīti cet, katham upalambhaḥ? kiṃ kramavata eva kāraṇād ayaṃ kāryakramaḥ? kiṃ vānavadhāraṇenaivopalambha iti? yadi kramavata evāyaṃ kāryakrama ity upalambhaḥ, so 'kṣaṇikābhāvaniścaye katham? na hy anyābhāvāniścaye 'tredam evety upalambhaḥ pramāṇaṃ bhavati. abhāvaś cānupalabdhyāpy dṛśyasyaiva niścīyate. dṛśyatve cākṣaṇikasya kvacid asti darśanahetutvam.
analyzed: syāt etat bīja ādi kāraṇa kramāt aṅkura ādi kārya kramasya upalambhāt eva na kramāt kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti sidhyati iti ced katham upalambhaḥ kim kramavataḥ eva kāraṇāt ayam kārya kramaḥ kim vā anavadhāraṇena eva upalambhaḥ iti yadi kramavataḥ eva ayam kārya kramaḥ iti upalambhaḥ kṣaṇika abhāva niścaye katham na hi anya abhāva aniścaye eva iti upalambhaḥ pramāṇam bhavati abhāvaḥ ca anupalabdhyā api dṛśyasya eva niścīyate dṛśya tve ca akṣa

original: atha kramavataḥ kāraṇāt kāryakrama ity anavadhāraṇenaivopalambhaḥ, tadā nākramāt kramiṇo bhāva iti kathaṃ niścayaḥ? na hi pitrāditaḥ putrādijanmadarśanād eva karmādito na tajjanmeti niścayaḥ sambhavati.
analyzed: atha kramavataḥ kāraṇāt kārya kramaḥ iti anavadhāraṇena eva upalambhaḥ tadā na akramāt kramiṇaḥ bhāvaḥ iti katham niścayaḥ na hi pitṛ āditaḥ putra ādi janma darśanāt eva karma āditaḥ na tat janma iti niścayaḥ sambhavati

original: {arthād vyatirekasiddhiśaṃkā tannirāsaś ca}

syād etat — yathā dahanād dhūma ity upalambhād eva nādahanād dhūma iti niścayo bhavati, tathā kramavataḥ kramiṇāṃ bhāva ity upalambhād eva nākramāt kramiṇāṃ bhāva iti niścayo bhavati. viṣamo 'yam upanyāsaḥ. tatra hi satsv apy anyeṣu dahanābhāvād dhūmo nopalabhyate 'gnisadbhāvāt tūpalabhyata ity anvayavyatirekasiddhau kāryakāraṇaniyamaḥ sidhyatu, na punar atra satsv api krameṣu kramavato 'bhāvān na kramiṇāṃ bhāva ity upalambho 'sti, yena vyatirekasiddhiḥ syāt.
analyzed: syāt etat yathā dahanāt dhūmaḥ iti upalambhāt eva na adahanāt dhūmaḥ iti niścayaḥ bhavati tathā kramavataḥ kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti upalambhāt eva na akramāt kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti niścayaḥ bhavati viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ tatra hi satsu api anyeṣu dahana abhāvāt dhūmaḥ na upalabhyate gni sadbhāvāt tu upalabhyate iti anvaya vyatireka siddhau kārya kāraṇa niyamaḥ sidhyatu na punar atra satsu api krameṣu kramavataḥ bhāvāt na kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti upalamb

original: {akramasya nāsattvam}
analyzed: akramasya na a sattvam

original: upalambhe copalambhalakṣaṇārthakriyākāritvād akramasya nāsattvaṃ yathādarśanaṃ ca kāryakāraṇasvabhāvābhyanujñātaṃ yuktam, na sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ sādhīyas tathā hi — dhūmakāraṇatvāviśeṣe 'pi na kāṣṭhādīnām apy agnisvabhāvatā, dahanajanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi na bhasmavisphoṭādīnām api dhūmasvabhāvatā, tasmād aṅkurādijanakatvāviśeṣe 'pi bījādīny eva kramavanti, neśvaraśālitvādīni. tathā kramabhāvitvāviśeṣe 'py aṅkurādīny evaikasmād bījān notpadyante, jñānādīni tu kānicid utpadyante. tathā bījaṃ krameṇāpi kiṃcit karoti, kāraṇatvāt, cakrādivat. evam aṅkurāder apy ekaikātmanaḥ kramakartṛtvaṃ sādhanīyaṃ cakrādivad iti. yathaikasmāc cakrād ghaṭādīni krameṇaiva bhavanti, kuṭhārād vṛkṣacchedādīni, evam anyad api maṇiprabhṛtibhinnasvabhāvaṃ krameṇa kāryāṇi kurvad upalabdham iti. sādhyasamatvād anudāharaṇam iti cet, pratyakṣasiddhasya sādhyasamatvāyogāt. evaṃ hi na kiṃcid udāharaṇaṃ sidhyet. sarvatra sādhyasamatvadūṣaṇasyāpratīghātāt.
analyzed: upalambhe ca upalambha lakṣaṇa arthakriyā kāri tvāt akramasya na asattvam yathādarśanam ca kārya kāraṇa svabhāva abhyanujñātam yuktam na sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ sādhīyaḥ tathā hi dhūma kāraṇa tva aviśeṣe pi na kāṣṭha ādīnām api agni svabhāva tā dahana janya tva aviśeṣe pi na bhasma visphoṭa ādīnām api dhūma svabhāva tā tasmāt aṅkura ādi janaka tva aviśeṣe pi bīja ādīni eva kramavanti na īśvara śāli tva ādīni tathā krama bhāvi tva avi

original: {vartamānatvāt kṣaṇikatvam eva pratyakṣagrāhyam ity āśaṃkā}
analyzed: vartamāna tvāt kṣaṇika tvam eva pratyakṣa grāhyam iti āśaṃkā

original: nanu ca vartamānamātragrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na tatpūrvottarakālavyāpitvaṃ paricchinatty apratibhāsanāt. na hi pratyakṣajñāne pūrvottarakālāvasthitarūpeṇa vastu pratibhāti, apūrvadarśino 'pi pratibhāsaprasaṅgāt. tasmān nākṣaṇikatvaṃ pratyakṣagrāhyaṃ kiṃ tu kṣaṇikatvam eva pratyakṣeṇāpi gṛhyate kṣaṇāntarāsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ hi vastu kṣaṇikam ucyate. tac ca tathā pratibhāty eveti.
analyzed: nanu ca vartamāna mātra grāhakam pratyakṣam na tad pūrva uttara kāla vyāpi tvam paricchinatti a pratibhāsanāt na hi pratyakṣa jñāne pūrva uttara kāla avasthita rūpeṇa vastu pratibhāti apūrva darśiṇā u pi pratibhāsa prasaṅgāt tasmāt na akṣaṇika tvam pratyakṣa grāhyam kim tu kṣaṇika tvam eva pratyakṣeṇa api gṛhyate kṣaṇa antara asaṃsṛṣṭam hi vastu kṣaṇikam ucyate tat ca tathā pratibhāti eva iti

original: {tannirāsaḥ}

tad apy ayuktam, kṣaṇamātrapratibhāsitve hi kāryakāraṇabhāvapratipattir api na syāt, kuta eva kramavatkāraṇāt. kramavatkāryotpādasiddhiḥ? tathā hi — kāryakāraṇabhāvapratītir arthayoḥ syāt? arthajñānayor vā? kiṃ vā jñānayor iti?

api ca kāraṇabhāvāt kāryabhāvaḥ kathaṃ gṛhyate? kim ata eva bhavati? āhosvid ato bhavaty eva? kiṃ vāto 'pi bhavatīti? nātra pakṣāntaraṃ paśyāmaḥ. tatra yady ata eva bhavati, sāmarthyād anyato bhavatīti gamyate. tatrāpi vikalpadvayam — idānīm? anyadā veti? yadīdānīm ata eveti matiḥ. anyadā na hi bhavaty anyata iti syāt. anyadāpy ata eveti. nātra pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ idānīm api deśāntareṇa bhavaty anyata iti kutaḥ pratītiḥ? na caivaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāve niyamābhāvāt.

original: etena pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva ity api pratyuktam, tathā hi — pratyakṣānupalambhaśabdena yady anvayavyatirekāv evocyete, tadā tayor agṛhītayoḥ sādhakatvaṃ nāsti, grahaṇaṃ ca pratyakṣenānumānena vā yathā na sambhavati, tathoktam. atha vidhipratiṣedhagrāhi pratyakṣam eva tathocyate, tad apy ayuktam. na pratyakṣeṇa tadbhāve bhāvo gṛhyate, nāpi tadabhāve 'bhāva ity uktam. avyabhicāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratipattavyo 'nyathā kāryāt kāraṇānumānaṃ na syāt. pratyakṣaṃ tu kṣaṇāntare 'pi na vyāpṛtam, kuto deśakālānantabhedeṣu?

original: {saugatanaye saṃvādanirākaraṇam}

original: athāparaṃ sparśādivijñānam, tad apy asat; na hy arthāntaravijñāne 'rthāntaravijñānasya saṃvādo 'tiprasaṅgāt. kena vā viśeṣeṇa cakṣurādivijñānasya sparśādivijñānāt saṃvāda ucyate? na hi naiyāyikavat tvayā darśanasparśanābhyām ekārthasya grahaṇam iṣṭam, nāpi pūrvottarakālavijñānānām ekaviṣayatvam. tat kathaṃ jñānāntarotpattau pūrvajñānasya saṃvādaḥ.
analyzed: atha aparam sparśa ādi vijñānam tat api asat na hi artha antara vijñāne rtha antara vijñānasya saṃvādaḥ tiprasaṅgāt kena vā viśeṣeṇa cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānasya sparśa ādi vijñānāt saṃvādaḥ ucyate na hi naiyāyika vat tvayā darśana sparśanābhyām eka arthasya grahaṇam iṣṭam na api pūrva uttara kāla vijñānānām eka viṣaya tvam tat katham jñāna antara utpattau pūrva jñānasya saṃvādaḥ

original: paritoṣād iti cet syād etat — jalādyarthasya cakṣurvijñāne jāte 'py anāśvāsaḥ tāvad yāvan na sparśādijñānaṃ bhavati. sparśādijñāne ca paritoṣo bhavati, tato 'nāśvāsanivṛtteḥ prāmāṇyavyavahāra iti, naitad asti; paritoṣasya pūrvajñānārthapratibandhāsiddheḥ — na hi pratyakṣeṇa sparśādijñānād utpannaḥ paritoṣaś cakṣur vijñānasatyatvapratibaddhaḥ kvacid upalabdaḥ, nāpy anumānena, tatpratibandhāsiddhāv anumānapravṛtter ayogāt. na cāpratibaddhād eva paritoṣāt prāmāṇyasiddhiḥ, atiprasaṅgāt. kiṃ ca svapnādiṣv api paritoṣasambhavāt. api ca —
analyzed: paritoṣāt iti ced syāt etat jala ādi arthasya cakṣuḥ vijñāne jāte api anāśvāsaḥ tāvat yāvat na sparśa ādi jñānam bhavati sparśa ādi jñāne ca paritoṣaḥ bhavati tatas na āśvāsa nivṛtteḥ prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ iti na etat asti paritoṣasya pūrva jñāna artha pratibandha asiddheḥ na hi pratyakṣeṇa sparśa ādi jñānāt utpannaḥ paritoṣaḥ cakṣuḥ vijñāna satya tva pratibaddhaḥ kvacid upalabdaḥ na api anumānena tad pratibandha asiddhau anumāna

original: "saṃvedanaṃ pramāṇaṃ cet paritoṣaḥ kim arthakaḥ". yadi saṃvedanaṃ pramāṇam, tata evārthasiddhiḥ, kim aparaṃ paritoṣaḥ kariṣyati? saṃvedanān na siddhaṃ yatparitoṣaśatair api kathaṃ tatsādhyaṃ saṃvedanād aparasya hi paritoṣasya ka upayogaḥ? arthasādhanam iti cet, katham anyenānyasya siddhiḥ? sambandhāc cet, sambandhaḥ kena siddhaḥ? paritoṣata eveti cet, tatrāpi sambandhasiddhir apekṣaṇīyety anavasthā. saṃvedanāc cet, tata evārthasiddhir iti vyarthaḥ paritoṣaḥ. saṃvedanād arthasiddhipakṣe 'py ukta eva doṣaḥ.
analyzed: saṃvedanam pramāṇam ced paritoṣaḥ kim arthakaḥ yadi saṃvedanam pramāṇam tatas eva artha siddhiḥ kim aparam paritoṣaḥ kariṣyati saṃvedanāt na siddham yat paritoṣa śataiḥ api katham tat sādhyam saṃvedanāt aparasya hi paritoṣasya kaḥ upayogaḥ artha sādhanam iti ced katham anyena anyasya siddhiḥ sambandhāt ced sambandhaḥ kena siddhaḥ paritoṣataḥ eva iti ced tatra api sambandha siddhiḥ apekṣaṇīyā iti anavasthā saṃvedanāt ced tatas eva artha siddh

original: etenārthāvimuktir api pratyuktā — tasyāḥ api saṃvedanād arthāntaratve paritoṣavan nārthasādhakatvam. tadanarthāntaratve 'pi svākāramātravedanāt bhrāntijñānavan nārthasādhakatvam ity uktam. etena smṛtyabhilāṣadveṣādayaḥ pratyuktā iti. tasmān na jñānārthayor api kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sidhyati.
analyzed: etena artha avimuktiḥ api pratyuktā tasyāḥ api saṃvedanāt artha antara tve paritoṣa vat na artha sādhaka tvam tad anartha antara tve pi sva ākāra mātra vedanāt bhrānti jñāna vat na artha sādhaka tvam iti uktam etena smṛti abhilāṣa dveṣa ādayaḥ pratyuktāḥ iti tasmāt na jñāna arthayoḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sidhyati

original: {jñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvanirāsaḥ}

nāpi jñānayoḥ svātmasaṃvinmātratvāt — na hi tvanmate jñānaṃ jñānāntaraṃ vetti. na ca kāraṇakāle kāryasaṃvittiḥ, anutpannatvād eva, nāpi kāryakāle kāraṇasaṃvittiḥ vinaṣṭatvād eva. na caikarūpasaṃvittāv eva, kāryakāraṇabhāvapratipattir ity uktam. paritoṣāvimuktismṛtyādīnāṃ tu pūrvoktenaiva nyāyenātrāpi pratikṣepo draṣṭavyaḥ, tataś cānvayavyatirekādhigamo 'py asambhavī tenānumānād api jñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'śakyaniścayaḥ. tad evaṃ vartamānaikakṣaṇamātragrahaṇavādināṃ na kathaṃcit kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratīyate, tadapratītau cārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sattvam asiddhatvān na sādhanam.
analyzed: nā api jñānayoḥ sva ātma saṃvid mātra tvāt na hi tvad mate jñānam jñāna antaram vetti na ca kāraṇa kāle kārya saṃvittiḥ anutpanna tvāt eva nā api kārya kāle kāraṇa saṃvittiḥ vinaṣṭa tvāt eva na ca eka rūpa saṃvittau eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratipattiḥ iti uktam paritoṣa avimukti smṛti ādīnām tu pūrva uktena eva nyāyena atra api pratikṣepaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tatas ca anvaya vyatireka adhigamaḥ pi asambhavī tena anumānāt api jñānayoḥ kārya

original: atha tarkapramāṇagamyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ. adṛṣṭasambandhāt parīkṣārthapratipattir iti tarkalakṣaṇaṃ. tathā hi — tadbhāve 'bhāva upalabhyate na kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'gnidhūmayor niyamalakṣaṇam. sambandho 'pi na tadbhāvabhāvena saha kāryakāraṇabhāvasyopalabhyate. pratiyanti ca laukikāḥ — yasmād ata idaṃ bhavati, tasmād asyedaṃ kāryam ity ata iyaṃ pratītis tarkataḥ arthāpattito vā — yady etat kāryaṃ na syād ato 'sya bhavanam eva na ghaṭata ity adṛṣṭārthaparikalpanārthāpattiḥ.
