original: api ca mokṣaḥ kasya cintyate? tasyaiva brahmaṇa ity ayuktam, tasya svabhāvamuktatvāt. saṃsāritve vā na kaścin mukto 'stīti mokṣatadupāyayoḥ kenacid apy adṛṣṭatvād anupadeśaprasaṅgaḥ. tadanupadeśe ca kutas tatra pravṛttiḥ? pravartamāno 'pi yadaiko muktaḥ, tadaiva saṃsārocchedaprasaṅgo 'nyasya saṃsāriṇo 'sambhavāt. avidyāvaśān nātmābhimāna iti cet, kim apavarge 'pi avidyā na kṣīṇā? na ca muktād anyo 'py ātmāsti yasyāvidyā syāt. jīvātmānaḥ santīti cet, te kim anye? ananye vā? yady anye, tadaikatvavirodhaḥ. atha muktād ananye, tataḥ kathaṃ jīvātmanāṃ saṃsāraḥ?
analyzed: api ca mokṣaḥ kasya cintyate tasya eva brahmaṇaḥ iti ayuktam tasya svabhāva mukta tvāt saṃsāri tve vā na kaścid asti iti mokṣa tad upāyayoḥ kenacid api adṛṣṭa tvāt anupadeśa prasaṅgaḥ tad anupadeśe ca kutas tatra pravṛttiḥ yadā ekaḥ muktaḥ tadā eva saṃsāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ nyasya saṃsāriṇaḥ sambhavāt avidyā vaśāt na ātma abhimānaḥ iti ced kim apavarge avidyā na kṣīṇā na ca muktāt anyaḥ pi ātmā asti yasya avidyā syāt jīva ātm

original: {jalacandravaj jīvarūpabhedānupapattiḥ}
analyzed: jala candra vat jīva rūpa bheda anupapattiḥ

original: etena jalacandravad ity apu nirastam. yathaiva hi rāhucchanne candre na kvacij jalacandra upalabhyate, evaṃ paramātmanāpavargaprāpte saṃsārī na kvacid upalabhyate.
analyzed: etena jala candra vat iti nirastam yathā eva hi rāhu channe candre na kvacid jala candraḥ upalabhyate evam paramātmanā apavarga prāpte saṃsārī na kvacid upalabhyate

original: sukhaduḥkhādivyavasthānupapattiprasaṅgaś ca — yathā yādṛśam ākāśasthasya candrasya rūpam upalabhyate, tādṛśam eva sarvajalacandrāṇām, na praticandraṃ rūpavyavasthāsti, tathā yādṛśam eva svātmanaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā jñānecchādikaṃ vā, tādṛśam eva sarvasya syāt pratipuruṣaṃ sukhādivyavasthānupapattiḥ. śarīrabhedād vyavastheti cet, na; adṛṣṭatvāt — bālakaumārayauvanādiśarīrabhede 'pi vyavasthā na dṛṣṭā; pūrvaśarīreṣv anubhūtāni sukhādīni śāstrādīni ca vṛddhaśarīre 'py anusandhatte — mama sukham āsīd iti.
analyzed: sukha duḥkha ādi vyavasthā anupapatti prasaṅgaḥ ca yathā yādṛśam ākāśa sthasya candrasya rūpam upalabhyate tādṛśam eva sarva jala candrāṇām na prati candram rūpa vyavasthā asti tathā yādṛśam eva sva ātmanaḥ sukham duḥkham vā jñāna icchā ādikam vā tādṛśam eva sarvasya syāt prati puruṣam sukha ādi vyavasthā anupapattiḥ śarīra bhedāt vyavasthā iti ced na adṛṣṭa tvāt bāla kaumāra yauvana ādi śarīra bhede pi vyavasthā na dṛṣṭā pūrva

original: {ghaṭākāśadṛṣṭāntanirāsaḥ}

etena ghaṭākāśamaṭhākāśādyudāharaṇaṃ pratyuktam. kiṃ ca yathā ghaṭanivṛttāv eva ghaṭākāśaṃ muktaṃ bhavaty evaṃ dehanivṛttāv eva tadavacchinnaḥ pumān muktaḥ syād ity ayatnasiddho mokṣaḥ prasaktaḥ tataś ca mokṣaśāstraṃ vyartham.
analyzed: etena ghaṭa ākāśa maṭha ākāśa ādi udāharaṇam pratyuktam kim ca yathā ghaṭa nivṛttau eva ghaṭa ākāśam muktam bhavati evam deha nivṛttau eva tad avacchinnaḥ pumān muktaḥ syāt iti ayatna siddhaḥ mokṣaḥ prasaktaḥ tatas ca mokṣa śāstram vyartham

original: {avidyāsaṃskāranirāsaḥ}

dehanivṛttāv apy avidyādisaṃskāras tatkṛto 'sti, tadavacchinnasya pṛthagbhūtasyevātmapradeśasya saṃsāra iti cet, na; vikalpānupapatteḥ — sa hi dehakṛtaḥ saṃskāraḥ kiṃ dehavat paricchinnadeśaḥ? kiṃ vākāśasattāvad vyāpaka iti? prācye pakṣe citrakūṭadeśasthena dehena svāvacchinna evātmapradeśaḥ kṛtasaṃskāras tatraiva janmāntaraṃ janayet, sukhaduḥkhādyupabhogo 'pi tatraiva syāt, anyapradeśasya tatsaṃskāreṇāvachinnatvāt. atha gatvaraḥ saṃskāraḥ pradeśāntaram apy avachinatti, na; avidyādharmādisaṃskārasya niṣkriyatvena gamanānupapattiḥ. kiṃ ca muktam api pradeśaṃ gatvāvacchindyāt. tadavacchede ca muktasya punaḥ saṃsāritvaprasaṅgaḥ. tatraivāvasthitaḥ pradeśāntare 'pi svakāryaṃ saṃskāraḥ karotīti cet, evam api muktapradeśe 'pi kuryād iti sa eva prasaṅgaḥ.
analyzed: deha nivṛttau api avidyā ādi saṃskāraḥ tad kṛtaḥ sti tad avacchinnasya pṛthak bhūtasya iva ātma pradeśasya saṃsāraḥ iti ced na vikalpa anupapatteḥ sa hi deha kṛtaḥ saṃskāraḥ kim deha vat paricchinna deśaḥ kim vā ākāśa sattā vat vyāpakaḥ iti prācye pakṣe citrakūṭa deśa sthena dehena sva avacchinnaḥ eva ātma pradeśaḥ kṛta saṃskāraḥ tatra eva janmāntaram janayet sukha duḥkha ādi upabhogaḥ tatra eva syāt anya pradeśasya tad saṃskāreṇ

original: athākāśasattāvad vyāpakaḥ saṃskāraḥ, tena tarhi sarve 'py ātmapradeśā vyāptā iti. na kaścit pradeśo 'pavṛktaḥ syāt. etena maṇisūtrādinidarśanaṃ pratyuktam, ghaṭākāśādidhvāntenāsyāpi tulyadoṣatvāt. tasmān na sarvadeheṣv eka evātmeti.
analyzed: atha ākāśa sattā vat vyāpakaḥ saṃskāraḥ tena tarhi sarve pi ātma pradeśāḥ vyāptāḥ iti na kaścid pradeśa u pavṛktaḥ syāt etena maṇi sūtra ādi nidarśanam pratyuktam ghaṭa ākāśa ādi dhvāntena asya api tulya doṣa tvāt tasmāt na sarva deheṣu ekaḥ eva ātmā iti

original: {agnivisphuliṅgadṛṣṭāntanirāsaḥ}

atha taptāyaḥpiṇḍād agnikaṇā ivātmatattvāj jīvātmāno 'saṃkhyātā utpadyante. teṣāṃ saṃsāramokṣajñānādivyavastheti, na; saṃsāriṇām apy ātmanām anāditvasya prasādhitatvāt kṛtakānāṃ cānityatvaprasaṅgas tato 'paralokitvam.
analyzed: atha tapta ayaḥ piṇḍāt agni kaṇāḥ iva ātma tattvāt jīvātmānaḥ saṃkhyātāḥ utpadyante teṣām saṃsāra mokṣa jñāna ādi vyavasthā iti na saṃsāriṇām api ātmanām anādi tvasya prasādhita tvāt kṛtakānām ca anitya tva prasaṅgaḥ para loki tvam

original: {samudrodakadṛṣṭāntanirāsaḥ}

atha samudrād udakavat tata eva niḥsaranti, punas tatraiva līyanta iti, na; samudravad brahmaṇaḥ sāvayavatvādidoṣaprasaṅgāt. pratiṣiddhaś ca satkāryavādaḥ, tena pariṇāmalayapakṣe na dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścid siddhaḥ.
analyzed: atha samudrāt udaka vat tatas eva niḥsaranti punar tatra eva līyante iti na samudra vat brahmaṇaḥ sāvayava tva ādi doṣa prasaṅgāt pratiṣiddhaḥ ca satkārya vādaḥ tena pariṇāma laya pakṣe na dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścid siddhaḥ

original: {avidyāyā jīvatvaśaṃkātatannirāsaś ca}
analyzed: ca

original: athāvidyaiva jīvātmā, tasya cānāditvam asaṃkhyātatvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ ca, tannivṛttiś ca mokṣa iti. sa kasyeti vācyam? brāhmaṇas tāvan na sambhavatīty uktam. pradīpanirvāṇavad iti cet, tadarthaṃ kaḥ pravartate? jīvātmaiveti cet, na; ātmanivṛtter apuruṣārthatvāt. avidyāsvabhāvo hi jīvātmā kim artham ātmānaṃ nivartayati? na ca tasyātmanivṛttāv upāyo 'sti. vidyā hi tāvan nāvidyātmake jīve prādurbhavati, virodhāt. nāpi brahmaṇi tatra nityatvāt. na copāyāntareṇāvidyāyā ātyantikaḥ kṣayaḥ sambhavati. na ca mithyājñānād anyā kācid avidyāsti. jñānasya ca sarvasyāśritatvaṃ samarthitam, tenāvidyā kasyeti vācyam. brahmaṇas tatpradeśasya vā na sambhavatīty uktam. na hy ekāśrayatve sukhaduḥkhasmṛtyādīnāṃ vyavasthā sambhavati, śarīrabhede 'py anusandhānadarśanāt. garbhaśarīrānubhūteṣv ananusandhānavad iti cet, na; tatra smṛtihetoḥ saṃskārasyānutpannatvād vinaṣṭatvād vābhibhūtatvād vā. śarīrāntareṣv apy evam iti cet, na; tatrāpy asmṛtiprasaṅgāt. dṛśyate copādhyāyasya śāstrārthādyanusmṛtiḥ. tatas tatsaṃskāro 'nabhibhūta evāstīti gamyate. tataḥ śiṣyāder api smṛtiprasaṅgas tadātmaikatvāt kaumārādiśarīreṣv iva. tasmāt pratiśarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhasmṛtyādivyavasthopalambhān nānātmeti. nanu bhavatpakṣe 'pi sarve 'py ātmāno vyāpakatvāt sarvasminn api śarīre santīti vyavasthānupapattiḥ ekasmiṃś ca śarīre sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ liṅgaṃ gṛhyeta, na; adṛṣṭaniyamād vyavasthopapatteḥ — yatkṛtenādṛṣṭaviśeṣeṇa yaccharīram utpāditam, tat tasyaiva bhogāyatanaṃ bhavaty ātmāntarāṇāṃ tu tatra sannidhimātreṇa sattvaṃ na tv adhiṣṭhātṛtvenety ato naikasminn api śarīre sarveṣāṃ liṅgopalabdhiprasaṅga iti. tad evaṃ sthitam etat — saṃsāryātmāno 'saṃkhyātāḥ, paramātmā tv eka evety ataḥ paramopāsanadvāreṇa keṣāṃcin mokṣagamane 'py avirodhaḥ. tasmāt paramātmanopāsanāṅgatvenāpavargasādhanatvād uktaṃ paramātmano 'paramātmabhyo 'rthāntaratvena parijñānam iti.
analyzed: atha avidyā eva jīvātmā tasya ca anādi tvam asaṃkhyāta tvam saṃsāri tvam ca tad nivṛttiḥ ca mokṣaḥ iti sa kasya iti vācyam brāhmaṇaḥ tāvat na sambhavati iti uktam pradīpa nirvāṇa vat iti ced tad artham kaḥ pravartate jīvātmā eva iti ced na ātma nivṛtteḥ apuruṣa artha tvāt avidyā svabhāvaḥ hi jīvātmā kim artham ātmānam nivartayati na ca tasya ātma nivṛttau upāyaḥ usti vidyā hi tāvat na avidyā ātmake jīve prādurbhavati virodhāt nā api brahma

original: {upāsanāvidhiḥ}
analyzed: upāsanā vidhiḥ

original: kaḥ punas tasyopāsanavidhir ity ucyate — sa copāsanavidhiḥ kleśakṣayasamādhilābhārtham anuṣṭhānam. yena kenacid upāyena kleśā rāgadveṣamohākhyāḥ kṣīyante, maheśvaraviṣayaṃ cittaikāgryaṃ ca prāpyate, sa upāyo 'nuṣṭhīyamānaḥ parameśvaropāsanavidhir ity ucyate, tatra "yogāc cādhyātmavidhyupāyaiḥ" iti vacanāt. pātañjalādiśāstreṣv apy upadiṣṭa upāyaḥ svaśāstravirodhena pratipattavyaḥ. tatra yuktisāmarthyāc ca "paramatam apratiṣiddham anumatam" iti hi tantrayuktiḥ. tenājñānātmakāḥ suvarṇadānādīkṣādaya upāyā nātra gṛhyante, teṣāṃ rāgādikṣapaṇe sāmarthyābhāvāt. akṣapiteṣu ca saṃsāranivṛttir na sambhavatīti vicāritaṃ duḥkhasūtre. dvādaśavidhaprameyatattvajñānam antareṇānyathā jñānaṃ nopāya ity api vicāritam. dvādaśaprameyajñānam api notpannamātram asahāyaṃ rāgādinivṛttau samartham. kiṃ tarhi? yogopāyānuṣṭhānasahitam.
analyzed: kaḥ punar tasya upāsana vidhiḥ iti ucyate sa ca upāsana vidhiḥ kleśa kṣaya samādhi lābha artham anuṣṭhānam yena kenacid upāyena kleśāḥ rāga dveṣa moha ākhyāḥ kṣīyante maheśvara viṣayam citta aikāgryam ca prāpyate saḥ upāyaḥ nuṣṭhīyamānaḥ parameśvara upāsana vidhiḥ iti ucyate tatra yogāt ca adhyātma vidhi upāyaiḥ iti vacanāt pātañjala ādi śāstreṣu api upadiṣṭaḥ upāyaḥ sva śāstra virodhena pratipattavyaḥ tatra yukti sāmarthyāt

original: {dvividhayoganirūpaṇam}

yogaś ca vyutthitāvyutthitāvasthābhedena dvividhaḥ. tatra vyutthitāvasthāyāṃ tapaḥsvādhyāyādilakṣaṇaḥ kriyāyogaḥ sevanīyaḥ. tathā coktam — "tapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ", "kleśatanukaraṇārthaḥ samādhibhāvanārthaś ca". arthakramam āśrityeha viparyayeṇa pāṭhaḥ kṛtaḥ. pātañjale tu sūtre samādhibhāvanārthaḥ kleśatanukaraṇārthaś ceti pāṭhaḥ. tatrādhyātmikādiduḥkhasahiṣṇutvaṃ tapaḥ. bāhyanimittanirapekṣaṃ śarīraṃ mānasaṃ ca duḥkham ādhyātmikam, manuṣyapaśvādīni bhūtāny adhikṛtyotpannam ādhibhautikam, devaprayuktaṃ śītātapādinimittam adhikṛtyotpannam ādhidaivikam — tad etat trividham api duḥkhaṃ śāntabhāvena niyamaṃ kṛtvā sahamānasya dharmādharmayoḥ saṃcayakṣayau kurvat tapa ity ucyate. tato dharmasaṃcayād yogapravṛttihetuḥ śraddhādyatiśayo bhavati. adharmakṣayāc ca vyādhisaṃstyānasaṃśayapramādālasyādīnām antarāyāṇām upaśamaḥ, tato 'nākulaṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate.
analyzed: yogaḥ ca vyutthita avyutthita avasthā bhedena dvividhaḥ tatra vyutthita avasthāyām tapaḥ svādhyāya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ kriyāyogaḥ sevanīyaḥ tathā ca uktam tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvara praṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ kleśa tanu karaṇa arthaḥ samādhi bhāvanā arthaḥ ca artha kramam āśritya iha viparyayeṇa pāṭhaḥ kṛtaḥ pātañjale tu sūtre samādhi bhāvanā arthaḥ kleśa tanu karaṇa arthaḥ ca iti pāṭhaḥ tatra ādhyātmika ādi duḥkha sahiṣṇu tvam tapa

original: nanu duḥkhebhyaś cittavikṣepa eva bhavaty ato na yogārthinā tapaḥ kartavyam, dharmādharmayoḥ saṃcayakṣayau ca japapratyāhārādibhya eva bhavataḥ, tapaḥsādhanatve tu pramāṇaṃ nāstīti, naitad asti, yo hy unmādakāmādibhir abhibhūtaḥ, sa kathaṃ japapratyāhārādikaṃ kartuṃ śaknoti? atas tena tapaḥ kartavyam. yathā vastrasya sthūlo malaḥ sthūlopāyena nivartyate, sūkṣmas tu sūkṣmopāyeneti. tathātmanaḥ sthūlo malas tāvat sthūlopāyena nivartyate, sūkṣmas tu paścāt sūkṣmopāyena japapratyāhārādinā nivartyata iti.
analyzed: nanu duḥkhebhyaḥ citta vikṣepaḥ eva bhavati atas na yoga arthinā tapaḥ kartavyam dharma adharmayoḥ saṃcaya kṣayau ca japa pratyāhāra ādibhyaḥ eva bhavataḥ tapaḥ sādhana tve tu pramāṇam na asti iti na etat asti yaḥ hi unmāda kāma ādibhiḥ abhibhūtaḥ sa katham japa pratyāhāra ādikam kartum śaknoti atas tena tapaḥ kartavyam yathā vastrasya sthūlaḥ malaḥ sthūla upāyena nivartyate sūkṣmaḥ tu sūkṣma upāyena iti tathā ātmanaḥ sthūlaḥ malaḥ tā

original: {tapaso dharmisādhanatve pramāṇam}
analyzed: tapasaḥ dharmi sādhana tve pramāṇam

original: yac coktam — dharmasaṃcayādes tapaḥsādhanatve pramāṇaṃ nāstīti, tan na; āgamasiddhatvāt. tathā ca manuḥ —
analyzed: yat ca uktam dharma saṃcaya ādeḥ tapaḥ sādhana tve pramāṇam na asti iti tat na āgama siddha tvāt tathā ca manuḥ

original: "tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad daivaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukham /
analyzed: tapaḥ mūlam idam sarvam yat daivam mānuṣam sukham

original: tapomadhyaṃ budhaiḥ proktaṃ tapo 'ntaṃ vedadarśibhiḥ //"
analyzed: tapaḥ madhyam budhaiḥ proktam tapaḥ ntam veda darśibhiḥ

original: "mahāpātakinaś caiva śeṣāś cākāryakāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: mahāpātakinaḥ ca eva śeṣāḥ ca akārya kāriṇaḥ

original: tapasaiva sutaptena mucyante kilbiṣāt tataḥ //"
analyzed: tapasā eva su taptena mucyante kilbiṣāt tatas

original: "yat kiṃcid enaḥ kurvanti manovāṅmūrtibhir janāḥ /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid enaḥ kurvanti manaḥ vāc mūrtibhiḥ janāḥ

original: tat sarvaṃ ninudanty āśu tapasaiva tapodhanāḥ //"
analyzed: tat sarvam ninudanti āśu tapasā eva tapodhanāḥ

original: yady api tapaḥ svargādiphalakam api bhavati, tathāpi viśiṣṭajñānavairāgyādisahakāryupakṛtaṃ cittaprasādam eveṣadvyavadhānena karoti. prasanne tu citte tapo niyamaṃ cāndrāyaṇādikaṃ parisamāpya yogāṅgāny evānutiṣṭheta. yas tu pūrvajanmakṛtatapaḥsāmarthyāt pratyāhārādiṣu samartha eva, taṃ prati tapo nopadiśyate, tadarthasya siddhatvād iti.
analyzed: yadi api tapaḥ svarga ādi phalakam api bhavati tathā api viśiṣṭa jñāna vairāgya ādi sahakāri upakṛtam citta prasādam eva īṣat vyavadhānena karoti prasanne tu citte tapaḥ niyamam cāndrāyaṇa ādikam parisamāpya yoga aṅgāni eva anutiṣṭheta yaḥ tu pūrva janma kṛta tapaḥ sāmarthyāt pratyāhāra ādiṣu samarthaḥ eva tam prati tapaḥ na upadiśyate tad arthasya siddha tvāt iti

original: {kriyāyoganirūpaṇam}

praśāntamantrasyeśvaravācino 'bhyāsaḥ svādhyāyaḥ. kṣudrasiddhihetur apīśvaravācī mantro 'stīti tatpratiṣedhārthaṃ praśāntagrahaṇam. paramātmaikaniṣṭhena bhavitavyam iti. jñānārtham īśvaragrahaṇaṃ yogaśāstrārthābhyāso vā svādhyāya iti. parameśvaratattvasya bhaktyatiśayāt prabandhenānucintanaṃ paryālocanam īśvarapraṇidhānaṃ stutijapapuṣpādibhir ārādhanaṃ vā. sarvakriyāṇāṃ paramagurāv arpaṇaṃ vā. tadvācakasya praṇavasya japas tadarthabhāvanaṃ ceti. seyaṃ tapaḥsvādhyāyādilakṣaṇakriyāyogahetutvād yoga ity ucyate. sa ca kriyāyogaḥ saṃsevyamānaḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayati kleśāṃś ca tanūkaroti.
analyzed: praśānta mantrasya īśvara vācinaḥ bhyāsaḥ svādhyāyaḥ kṣudra siddhi hetuḥ api īśvara vācī mantraḥ sti iti tad pratiṣedha artham praśānta grahaṇam paramātma eka niṣṭhena bhavitavyam iti jñāna artham īśvara grahaṇam yoga śāstra artha abhyāsaḥ vā svādhyāyaḥ iti parameśvara tattvasya bhakti atiśayāt prabandhena anucintanam paryālocanam īśvara praṇidhānam stuti japa puṣpa ādibhiḥ ārādhanam vā sarva kriyāṇām parama gurau arpaṇam vā tad vā

original: {kleśāḥ}
analyzed: kleśāḥ

original: ke punar atra kleśāḥ kriyanto vety ucyate. samāsato rāgadveṣamohāḥ kleśāḥ, te hi samādhipratyanīkatvena saṃsārāpattihetutvena ca puruṣaṃ kleśayantīti. tatrāśaktilakṣaṇo rāgaḥ. asahiṣṇutvalakṣaṇo dvaṣaḥ mithyāpratyayo moha iti. nanu "avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ" iti patañjaliḥ. tato 'smitābhiniśeśayoḥ kiṃ nātrābhidhānam? na; asambhavād atraivāntarbhāvāc ca. tathā hi — "dṛgdarśanaśaktyor ekātmatevāsmitā" iti lakṣaṇam uktam. asyārthaḥ — "puruṣo dṛkśaktir buddhir darśanaśaktiḥ, tayor ekasvarūpāpattir ivāsmitā bhoktṛbhogyaśaktyor atyantāsaṃkīrṇayor avibhāgaprātvāv iva satyāṃ bhogaḥ prakalpyate. svarūpapratilambhe hi tayoḥ kaivalyam eva bhavati" iti. etac ca pradhānapratiṣedhād bhogapratiṣedhāc ca pratiṣīddham. vibhakte cāvibhāgajñānam avidyaiva, na tato 'nyāsmitā. tathābhiniveśalakṣaṇam — "svarasāvāhī viduṣe 'pi tathā rūdho 'bhiniveśaḥ". yo 'yam ātmāśīrjātamātrasyāpi sarvaprāṇino bhavati — mā na bhūvam, bhūyasam iti maraṇatrāsaḥ, so 'bhiniveśaḥ. so 'nādimaraṇaduḥkhānubhavārūḍhavāsanātmatvāt svarasavāhīty ucyate. sa ca yathātyantamūḍheṣu dṛśyate, tathā viduṣo 'pi jñātapūrvāparāntasyārūḍhaḥ pratīyata iti. asyāpi mohe dveṣe vāntarbhāvaḥ, avaśyambhāvini maraṇe jīvitāśātasmiṃstad iti pratyayarūpatvāt mohaḥ. viduṣo 'py adhyātmadoṣavaśād diṅmohādivan mohaḥ sambhavatīty uktam. maraṇaduḥkhāsahiṣṇutvam eva maraṇatrāsaḥ, tena dveṣān na bhidyate. kiṃcid vaidharmyād bhede tv īrṣyāmanyumātsaryamadamānādīnām api bhedaprasaṅgaḥ, tataś ca pañcatvaniyamo 'pi na syāt, tasmāt trividhaḥ eva kleśaḥ. tathā ca sūtram — "tattrairāśyarāgadveśamohārthāntarabhāvāt" iti. nanu doṣāṇāṃ trairāśyam uktam, kleśāḥ kiṃ tato 'nye? doṣā eva hi "na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīnakleśasya" ity atra kleśaśabdena uktāḥ sūtrakṛteti. ta ete kleśāḥ kriyāyogam anutiṣṭhadbhir vidvadbhir pratidinaṃ tanūbhavantaḥ pratyakṣeṇāpy upalabhyanta iti. yathā ca kriyāyogaḥ kleśakṣayahetuḥ, tathā yogāṅgāny apīty atas tāny apy atiyatnenānuṣṭheyāni.
analyzed: ke punar atra kleśāḥ kriyantaḥ vā iti ucyate samāsatas rāga dveṣa mohāḥ kleśāḥ te hi samādhi pratyanīka tvena saṃsāra āpatti hetu tvena ca puruṣam kleśayanti iti tatra aśakti lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ asahiṣṇu tva lakṣaṇaḥ dvaṣaḥ mithyāpratyayaḥ mohaḥ iti nanu avidyā asmitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ iti patañjaliḥ smita abhiniśeśayoḥ kim na atra abhidhānam na asambhavāt atra eva antarbhāvāt ca tathā hi dṛś darśana śaktyoḥ eka

original: {yogāṅgāni}
analyzed: yogāṅgāni

original: kāni punas tāni yogāṅgāni kiyanti cety ucyante — "yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhāradhāraṇadhyānasamādhayo 'ṣṭāv aṅgāni". aṅgāni nirvartakānīty arthaḥ. samādhitaḥ ko 'nyo yogo yasya samādhir aṅgam iti cet, samādhir evāntyaprakarṣāpanno yogaḥ, tasya pūrvaḥ samādhir aṅgam, antyaśabdasyādyamadhyaśabdavat. atha vā sarvo 'pi samādhiprakarṣaḥ pūrvasamādhijanyatvena yoga uttaraprakarṣajanakatvenāṅgam iti. yadi samādhita eva samādhir bhavati, nanv evam ekam evāṅgaṃ prāptam ato 'ṣṭāv aṅgānīti na vācyam, na; pūrvapūrvasiddhāv uttarottrāsiddheḥ, na hi yamāsiddhau niyamaḥ sidhyati, niyamāsiddhau cāsanaṃ na sidhyati, āsanāsiddhau ca prāṇayāmo na sidhyati, tadasiddhau pratyāhāro na sidhyati, tadasiddhau dhāraṇā na sidhyati, tadasiddhau dhyānaṃ na sidhyati, dhyānāsiddhau ca samādhir na sidhyaty ato ṣṭāṅgānām api yogāṅgatvam iti.
analyzed: kāni punar tāni yoga aṅgāni kiyanti ca iti ucyante yama niyama āsana prāṇāyāma pratyāhāra dhāraṇa dhyāna samādhayaḥ ṣṭau aṅgāni aṅgāni nirvartakāni iti arthaḥ samādhitaḥ kaḥ nyaḥ yogaḥ yasya samādhiḥ aṅgam iti ced samādhiḥ eva antya prakarṣa āpannaḥ yogaḥ tasya pūrvaḥ samādhiḥ aṅgam antya śabdasya ādya madhya śabda vat atha vā sarvaḥ api samādhi prakarṣaḥ pūrva samādhi janya tvena yogaḥ uttara prakarṣa janaka tvena aṅgam it

original: {(1) yamanirūpaṇam}

"tatra deśakālāvasthābhir aniyatāḥ puruṣasya śuddhivṛddhihetavo yamāḥ" śuddhir adharmakṣayaḥ, vṛddhir dharmopacayaḥ. atha vā śuddhiś cittavaimalyam, vṛddhir yogotkarśaḥ. taddhetavo ye deśādibhir aniyatāḥ sarvasmin deśe 'nuṣṭhīyante sarvasmin kāle sarvasyām avasthāyām, te yamā ahiṃsādayaḥ.
analyzed: tatra deśa kāla avasthābhiḥ aniyatāḥ puruṣasya śuddhi vṛddhi hetavaḥ yamāḥ śuddhiḥ adharma kṣayaḥ vṛddhiḥ dharma upacayaḥ atha vā śuddhiḥ citta vaimalyam vṛddhiḥ yoga utkarśaḥ tad hetavaḥ ye deśa ādibhiḥ aniyatāḥ sarvasmin deśe nuṣṭhīyante sarvasmin kāle sarvasyām avasthāyām te yamāḥ ahiṃsā ādayaḥ

original: nanv ahiṃsādayo 'pi kaiścid deśādiniyamenānuṣṭhīyante, yathā — tīrthe hiṃsāṃ na kariṣyāmi sarvadivaseṣu vā. ayuddhāvasthāyāṃ vā prāṇivadhaṃ na kariṣyāmīti. na; deśādyapekṣitve 'hiṃsādīnām api niyamatvāt, ata eva gṛhasthādeḥ paramārthato niyamāḥ santi. yamair upeto hi yatir ity ucyate. yamābhāve kathaṃ gṛhasthāder niyamaniṣpattir iti cet, na; pravartakadharmaniṣpādakaniyamaniṣpatter avirodhāt. nivartako hi yatidharmaḥ, taddhetavo niyamābhraṣṭayam asya na niṣpadyanta iti.
analyzed: nanu ahiṃsā ādayaḥ api kaiścid deśa ādi niyamena anuṣṭhīyante yathā tīrthe hiṃsām na kariṣyāmi sarva divaseṣu vā ayuddha avasthāyām vā prāṇi vadham na kariṣyāmi iti na deśa ādi apekṣi tve hiṃsā ādīnām api niyama tvāt atas eva gṛhastha ādeḥ paramārthataḥ niyamāḥ santi yamaiḥ upetaḥ hi yatiḥ iti ucyate yama abhāve katham gṛhastha ādeḥ niyama niṣpattiḥ iti ced na pravartaka dharma niṣpādaka niyama niṣpatteḥ avirodhāt nivartakaḥ

original: {(2) niyamanirūpaṇam}

"deśakālāvasthāpekṣiṇaḥ puṇyahetavaḥ kriyāviśeṣaniyamāḥ" tatra deśāpekṣi devatāpradakṣiṇam. kālāpekṣi sandhyopāsanam. japakriyā tu śudhyavasthāmātram apekṣate. puṇyātiśayaṃ pratideśādyapekṣitatvam asty anantam, śivasannidhāv ityādiśravaṇāt. evam anye 'pi kriyāviśeṣā deśādyapekṣatvena niyamā iti. pātañjalābhiprāyeṇa tu nivṛttilakṣaṇā yamāḥ, pravṛttilakṣaṇā niyamā iti yamaniyamalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam. tathā coktam — "ahiṃsāsatyāsteyabrahmacaryāparigrahā yamāḥ". "śaucasantoṣatapaḥsvāyādhyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ" iti.
analyzed: deśa kāla avasthā apekṣiṇaḥ puṇya hetavaḥ kriyā viśeṣa niyamāḥ tatra deśa apekṣi devatā pradakṣiṇam kāla apekṣi sandhyā upāsanam japa kriyā tu śudhi avasthā mātram apekṣate puṇya atiśayam pratideśa ādi apekṣita tvam asti anantam śiva sannidhau ityādi śravaṇāt evam anye pi kriyā viśeṣāḥ deśa ādi apekṣa tvena niyamāḥ iti pātañjala abhiprāyeṇa tu nivṛtti lakṣaṇāḥ yamāḥ pravṛtti lakṣaṇāḥ niyamāḥ iti yama niyama lak

original: {(3) āsananirūpaṇam}
analyzed: āsana nirūpaṇam

original: "yogakarmavirodhi kleśajayārthaṃ karaṇabandha āsanam" yogakriyāyā virodhinaḥ kleśā vyādhyādayaḥ, teṣāṃ hy āsanajayāj jayaḥ śruyate. karaṇāny atra śarīrāvayavāḥ pādādayaḥ, teṣāṃ bandhaḥ saṃyamaḥ prāṇāyāmādisiddhyarthaḥ. tad āsanaṃ sthiraṃ sukhenopaveśanam ity arthaḥ. tac ca padmakasvastikādyanekaprakāram.
analyzed: yoga karma virodhi kleśa jaya artham karaṇa bandhaḥ āsanam yoga kriyāyāḥ virodhinaḥ kleśāḥ vyādhi ādayaḥ teṣām hi āsana jayāt jayaḥ śruyate karaṇāni atra śarīra avayavāḥ pāda ādayaḥ teṣām bandhaḥ saṃyamaḥ prāṇāyāma ādi siddhi arthaḥ tat āsanam sthiram sukhena upaveśanam iti arthaḥ tat ca padmaka svastika ādi aneka prakāram

original: {(4) prāṇāyamanirūpaṇam}

koṣṭhasthavāyoḥ śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇasya gatichedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ. pracchanne nivāte nirjane niḥśabde ca pradeśe yathāsukham āsanaṃ baddhvā recakapūrakakumbhakaprakāraḥ kartavyaḥ. sa ca śanaiḥ śanair jetavyo vanagajendravat. yathā vanagajendraḥ prayogena śanair jīyamāno mahāntam upakāraṃ karoti, haṭhādaprayogena gṛhītas tu vināśam eva karoti tathā vāyuḥ prayogeṇa śanair jīyamāno 'śeṣam adharmaṃ rāgādimalaṃ ca nirnāśya yogaṃ prāpayati, aprayogeṇātikramyāvagṛhītas tu vātagulmādyanartham eva karotīti.
analyzed: koṣṭha stha vāyoḥ śvāsa praśvāsa lakṣaṇasya gati chedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ pracchanne nivāte nirjane niḥśabde ca pradeśe yathāsukham āsanam baddhvā recaka pūraka kumbhaka prakāraḥ kartavyaḥ sa ca śanais śanais jetavyaḥ vana gaja indra vat yathā vana gaja indraḥ prayogena śanais jīyamānaḥ mahāntam upakāram karoti haṭhāt aprayogena gṛhītaḥ tu vināśam eva karoti tathā vāyuḥ prayogeṇa śanais jīyamānaḥ śeṣam adharmam rāga ādi malam ca nirnā

original: {(5) pratyāhāranirūpaṇam}

samādhiprayatnīkārthebhyaḥ samantāc cetaso vyāvartanaṃ pratyāhāraḥ. pratyāhṛte hi cetasīndriyāṇy api pratyāhṛtāni bhavati. kasmāt? tanmūlanatvād indriyāṇāṃ pravṛtteḥ. pratyāhārābhiyuktasyendriyajayaḥ samādhilābhaś ca bhavati, nānyatheti.
analyzed: samādhi prayatnīka arthebhyaḥ samantāt cetasaḥ vyāvartanam pratyāhāraḥ pratyāhṛte hi cetasi indriyāṇi api pratyāhṛtāni bhavati kasmāt tad mūlana tvāt indriyāṇām pravṛtteḥ pratyāhāra abhiyuktasya indriya jayaḥ samādhi lābhaḥ ca bhavati na anyathā iti

original: {(6) dhāraṇānirūpaṇam}

deśabandhaś cittasya dhāraṇā. ko 'tra deśaḥ? kaś ca deśo cittasya bandha iti? śarīrādyavayavaḥ pādādiḥ, bāhyo vā sūryamaṇḍalādir deśa ity eke. vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ — paramātmaivātra deśo 'bhipretaḥ, tadārādhanapravṛttatvān mokṣāsthinaḥ. pādādiṣu dhāraṇānaṃ hi viṣṇulokādiprāptiḥ phalaṃ śrūyate. cittasya manasaḥ prayatnena dhāraṇaṃ niścalīkaraṇaṃ bandha ity ucyate, sādhāraṇeti.
analyzed: deśa bandhaḥ cittasya dhāraṇā kaḥ tra deśaḥ kaḥ ca cittasya bandhaḥ iti śarīra ādi avayavaḥ pāda ādiḥ bāhyaḥ vā sūrya maṇḍala ādiḥ deśaḥ iti eke vayam tu brūmaḥ paramātmā eva atra deśaḥ bhipretaḥ tad ārādhana pravṛtta tvāt mokṣa asthinaḥ pāda ādiṣu hi viṣṇu loka ādi prāptiḥ phalam śrūyate cittasya manasaḥ prayatnena dhāraṇam niścalīkaraṇam bandhaḥ iti ucyate sādhāraṇā iti

original: {(7) dhyānanirūpaṇam}

tatraikatānātā dhyānam. tasmin dhāraṇādeśe dhyeyālambanasya pratyayasya sadṛśaḥ pravāhaḥ pratyayāntareṇāpareṇāparāmṛṣṭo dhyānam. tatraikatānatety ukte 'pi cittasyety anuvṛtteś cittasyaikatānateti gamyate. manasaś ca sadṛśapratyayapravāhakartṛtvam evaikatānateti.
analyzed: tatra ekatānātā dhyānam tasmin dhāraṇā deśe dhyeya ālambanasya pratyayasya sadṛśaḥ pravāhaḥ pratyaya antareṇa apareṇa aparāmṛṣṭaḥ dhyānam tatra ekatāna tā iti ukte cittasya iti anuvṛtteḥ cittasya ekatāna tā iti gamyate manasaḥ ca sadṛśa pratyaya pravāha kartṛ tvam eva ekatāna tā iti

original: {(8) samādhinirūpaṇam}

tad evārthamātranirbhāsasvarūpeṇa śūnyam iva samādhiḥ. dhyānam eva dhyeyākāramātranirbhāsapratyayātmakena svarūpeṇa śūnyam iva yadā bhavaty upādhisaṃsargāt sphaṭikavat tadā samādhir ity ucyate. yad vā dhyānotkarṣān nivātācalapradīpāvasthānam ivaikatraiva cetaso 'vasthānaṃ samādhir abhidhīyate. sa ca prajñālokacihnaḥ samādhyutkarṣatāratamyād viprajñālokotkarṣatāratamyaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: tat eva artha mātra nirbhāsa svarūpeṇa śūnyam iva samādhiḥ dhyānam eva dhyeya ākāra mātra nirbhāsa pratyaya ātmakena svarūpeṇa śūnyam iva yadā bhavati upādhi saṃsargāt sphaṭika vat tadā samādhiḥ iti ucyate yat vā dhyāna utkarṣāt nivāta acala pradīpa avasthānam iva ekatra eva cetasaḥ samādhiḥ abhidhīyate sa ca prajñā āloka cihnaḥ samādhi utkarṣa tāratamyāt viprajñāloka utkarṣa tāratamyam bhavati

original: tad evam etāni yogāṅgāni mumukṣuṇā sarveṣu brahmādisthāneṣv anekaprakārāṇi sātiśayakṣayavadhabandhaparikleśādīni duḥkhāni bhāvayatā sarvatrānabhiratisaṃjñitaṃ paraṃ vairāgyam āśritya maheśvare tu atyantotkṛṣṭaguṇadarśanāt paramāṃ bhaktim āśritya taddarśanārtham atyantābhiyogena sevitavyāni. tataḥ samādhiprakarṣātiśayaṃ prāptāv acireṇaiva kālena bhagavantam anaupamyasvabhāvaṃ śivam avitathaṃ pratyakṣataḥ paśyati. dṛṣṭvā niratiśayaṃ śreyo 'pavargākhyaṃ prāpnoti. tathā coktam —
analyzed: tat evam etāni yoga aṅgāni mumukṣuṇā sarveṣu brahma ādi sthāneṣu aneka prakārāṇi sa atiśaya kṣaya vadha bandha parikleśa ādīni duḥkhāni bhāvayatā sarvatra anabhirati saṃjñitam param vairāgyam āśritya maheśvare tu atyanta utkṛṣṭa guṇa darśanāt paramām bhaktim āśritya tad darśana artham atyanta abhiyogena sevitavyāni tatas samādhi prakarṣa atiśayam prāptau acireṇa eva kālena bhagavantam anaupamya svabhāvam śivam avitatham pratyakṣataḥ paśyati

original: "yadā carmavad ākāśaṃ veṣṭayiṣyanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: yadā carma vat ākāśam veṣṭayiṣyanti mānavāḥ

original: tadā śivam avijñāya duḥkhasyānto bhaviṣyati //"
analyzed: tadā śivam a vijñāya duḥkhasya antaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: "tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti"
analyzed: tam eva viditvā atimṛtyum eti

original: ityādi ca.
analyzed: ityādi ca

original: ātmatvāviśeṣeti kasmān nānyadarśanān mokṣa iti cet, na; anyasya sarvānimittatvāt — na hy anyo 'py ātmā sarvotpattimatāṃ nimittam iti. dikkālayor api sarvotpattimatāṃ nimittakāraṇatvād aviśeṣa iti cet, na; apramāṇakatvāt.
analyzed: ātma tva aviśeṣa iti kasmāt na anya darśanāt mokṣaḥ iti ced na anyasya sarva animitta tvāt na hi ātmā sarva utpattimatām nimittam iti diś kālayoḥ api sarva utpattimatām nimitta kāraṇa tvāt aviśeṣaḥ iti ced na apramāṇaka tvāt

original: {kālasya diśaś ca sapramāṇatvāśaṅkā}
analyzed: kālasya diśaḥ ca sa pramāṇa tva āśaṅkā

original: nanv apramāṇakatvam asiddham, yataḥ kālaḥ parāparavyatikarayaugapadyāyaugapadyacirakṣiprapratyayaliṅgaḥ, teṣāṃ viṣayeṣu pūrvapratyayavilakṣaṇānām utpattāv anyanimittāsambhavāt. yad atra nimittam, sa kālaḥ. kṣaṇalavanimeṣakāṣṭhākalāmūhūrttayām āhorātrārdhamāsamāsatvaryanasaṃvatsarayugakalpamanvantarapralayamahāpralayavyavahārahetuś ca sarvakriyāṇāṃ cotpattisthitivināśahetuḥ, tadvyapadeśāt. sa ca talliṅgaviśeṣād eka eva kriyābhedān mativat pācakavad vā nānopacaryate. guṇavattvād anāśritatvāc ca dravyam iti.

original: {diśo dravyatvanirāsaḥ}

original: nanu vāstavatve yathā vārāṇasyāḥ paścimena prayāgaḥ, tathā kānyakubjād api syāt, na; anaikāntāt sannikarṣaviprakarṣādayo hi dharmā vāstavā iṣyante. na ca yathā pratiṣṭhānāpekṣayā sannikṛṣṭaḥ prayāgaḥ, tathā kānkubjāpekṣayāpīti. tasmāt pratiniyatanimittāpekṣayā prācyādidharmāṇām apy abhivyaktir ity alaṃ prasaṅgena. tan na dikkālayoḥ sarvotpattimatāṃ nimittakāraṇatvam.
analyzed: nanu vāstava tve yathā vārāṇasyāḥ paścimena prayāgaḥ tathā kānyakubjāt api syāt na anaikāntāt sannikarṣa viprakarṣa ādayaḥ hi dharmāḥ vāstavāḥ iṣyante na ca yathā pratiṣṭhāna apekṣayā sannikṛṣṭaḥ prayāgaḥ tathā kānkubja apekṣayā api iti tasmāt pratiniyata nimitta apekṣayā prācya ādi dharmāṇām api abhivyaktiḥ iti alam prasaṅgena tat na diś kālayoḥ sarva utpattimatām nimitta kāraṇa tvam

original: api ca yady upādānādyabhijñasya kālasya diśo vā jagannimittatvam iṣṭam, tadā maheśvara eva nāmāntareṇoktaḥ syāt. acetanatve tv anupāsyatvāt, na taddarśanaṃ śreyaḥsādhanaṃ syāt. cetano hi rājarṣiprabhṛtibhiḥ pratidinaṃ vinayena dṛśyamānaḥ kadācit prasanno bhūtvānugrahaṃ yathāsāmārthyena kurvann upalabhyate. nācetano 'samartho vā tasmāc chivadarśanād eva mokṣa iti.
